Just a waste of money, don't really need a spare, and shipping cost to return it is more than half the cost of the case.

title: Great but they don’t give u the charger jack
body: We like this very much but were disappointed that they didn’t include a charger jack plug in with this boxed up item.Had to order the $11 plug jack separately.

title: Very easy to use
body: I like the great sound.  I didn’t like the limited sound adjustment that can be made.

title: Awesome little speaker!
body: I’m so pleased I took a punt on this little speaker. I have a big old Beats boombox that I was using but carrying it from room to room was a pain. So that is now staying in my garage gym because this little speaker is just what I needed. It’s actually louder than I expected it to be, sound quality is great and the battery life is good considering I use it several hours a day. I’m only charging it once a week just now. I haven’t had any problems connecting it to my iPhones following the original syncing. For the price I am super happy.

title: Speaker
body: Need to charge frequently, could be louder , Bluetooth connectivity issues

title: Awesome Bluetooth Speaker!  Worth the Investment!
body: Sounds fantastic!  An unexpected sound out of a small, little speaker.  It's also splash proof!  I could not ask for a better portable speaker.  Easily syncs to your devices Bluetooth and holds charge for several sittings of listening to music.  The volume is also controlled from your phone or device which is great because you do not have two different items you must control the volume on.  If your phone or device is on max volume, so is the speaker and vice versa.  Amazon also beat the price of other retailers.  I was going to buy the item at Wal-Mart.  Taxes and all was approximately $108.00.  Amazon beat the price significantly.  I am very impressed with this portable Bluetooth speaker.  Worth the investment if you like listening to music while sitting on the porch, backpacking, camping, working in the shop, and etc.

title: Wears out fast
body: This was a gift for my husband that we have had for awhile now. At first, the sound quality was great. Now, it makes fuzzy sounds at certain volumes. The charge is also pretty crap now. It will say fully charged but then a few minutes of use later it’ll turn off as if it died and then you have to keep it plugged in to use it again. We also haven’t used it a whole lot either since we’ve gotten it, so it wears out faster than it should. Other than that it has been pretty handy and of decent quality.

title: JBL quality. I like it. however, slightly weak bass
body: JBL has the best and longest lasting battery and that was the reason I bought this.as I expected it, it is JBL!!!!  Everything works perfect and battery life is as advertised and I am very happy with it.then, why not 5 star?  the bass is slightly weaker than I had imagined.  But very good BT speaker. I am a happy customer.

title: AMAZING SOUND
body: I purchased this product on advice from a co-worker (I work as a letter carrier for USPS) and the sound is amazing. It fits right on the dash of the mail truck and the Bluetooth connection has so far been very consistent after one week's use. I've used it for listening to tunes on my iPod Touch as well as baseball games from streaming radio on my iPhone. Good bang for the $.

title: Me encanto definitivamente lo volvería a comprar
body: Me encanta como suena

title: Very good sound in a small package
body: I bought a different no-name brand Bluetooth speaker. It was so bad I didn’t want to use it. The flip4 sounds really good. I prefer it to my Bose Soundlink. The battery surprised me with how long it lasts. I played 4 hours of moderate volume tunes and when I plugged it in to charge, only 1 led was flashing(I think 80% charged). Easy to connect to both my iPhone and laptop. Good range too. I was outside in the woods about 50 paces away and it didn’t loose connection. I like this speaker a lot.

title: Best Speaker I've Ever Owned!
body: This little speaker packs a real punch for its size. The sound quality on this speaker is very crisp and clear and the base is quite deep. I've owned and tested many other speakers in its class and they can't compare. The durability on this thing is insane! I've thrown it town a 50ft staircase onto asphalt and no problem occurred. I've dunked it in water in multiple occasions and nothing happened. The battery life of this thing is also kind of amazing! But I've got to tell you that this speaker has its limits due to its size. It get the best quality use it in small/medium sized rooms or a small outdoor living spaces. Something this size has its limits. Besides that I highly recommend this speaker if your trying you make your final decision.

title: Great sound and battery life. Built tough.
body: Just got it today, the sound is awesome, came in partially charged so I got to play with it. Sounded great even at maxed out volume. Cant wait for my next beach day! Will upgrade to 5 stars after a little use, depending on battery life and durability.Update: best beach speaker ever! Great battery life, even in the heat at the beach all day. Great sound also. I love my speaker.

title: Wonderful
body: It's a JBL speaker - it's freaken good! What more can I say.Update: so I put it in my oven so that it maximizes the bass, kinda like the same thing as when you put your smartphone in a cup or bowl to increase the bass and loudness... Well anyway I forgot it in the oven and turned my oven to 400... 10 minutes later I go back to open my oven cuz I wanted to leave it open at 400 for the heat .. and there was my JBL baking.. poor thing. But the magic is that it STILL WORKS PERFECTLY :) It didn't even melt at all!! It was hot af but it's just fine!!

title: Very Happy with my choice
body: The JBL Flip 4 has exceeded my expectations.  Great purchase.  Sound, ease of use and Value.  And looks great!!!

title: Battery only last 6 hours on my device.
body: Sound- 5stars Bluetooth connectivity-3 starsBattery life-1 star. First day using my brand new camo Jbl flip 4. I could get away more then 25ft with phone on my pocket because music will stop playing and the worst thing I don’t like is the battery it only hold me 6 hours. I thought the label say 12 hours battery life but NO, ONLY 6 HOURS on my device !

title: Love it!!!!!
body: Love it!!!! ? ??

title: GOOD BUT NOT GREAT IF YOU NEED VOLUME
body: It will do. Great for portability to the beach and the sound quality is crisp and clear. However the off brand a friend  purchased a while back for me was MUCH Louder. At almost max level this JBL Flip 4 still sounds like personal space volume to me.  Not really great sounding for a small group at the beach or pool side for my Aqua Zunba class like I intended.

title: Amazing sound from this little speaker!
body: I was debating buying a Bose Bluetooth speaker so I did a little research and found a review from someone who had a Bose Bluetooth as well as this JBL Flip 4. He actually rated this one higher, so I decided to give it a try. For almost half the cost, this little JBL bluetooth speaker kicks out some serious sound and some serious bass!! I live in an apartment complex and so I don't need a huge system and this little speaker is perfect! Not only is the sound amazing, the battery lasts for days and you can use it to make phone calls and it also links together with other flip 4s so you can have a true surround sound experience if you have more than one of these speakers. I would definitely recommend the speaker to anyone looking for an affordable yet high quality device

title: Best sounding speaker in a portable unit.
body: JBL’s bigger speakers may sound louder,  but they’re not convenient in terms of portability. It’s small size and light weight still gives you  more room and comfortable to carry even in a small backpack. Great for office space, dorms and small bedrooms, and light enough to carry in hiking and camping with enough battery to last for a day.

title: Great sound!!!
body: This is a great buy!! The sound is amazing and the battery life is also great!!

title: Great
body: I like that sound a lot

title: Hopefully your box doesn’t come damaged
body: This is a great speaker! Sound quality probably just as good as my charge 3. The only reason I dropped a star was for the way it came in the mail. Outside amazon box was fine, but the jbl box was highly damaged, looked as if it had been dropped at least a few times. Hopefully won’t cause damage to the speaker in the long run. Not sure if the damaged box was because of amazon or from the dealer that provides the speaker... if I’m reviewing the speaker, 10/10

title: Great little speaker
body: I have always liked JBL.  Great bluetooth  connectivity I was able to walk away from the speaker with my phone probably a good 75-80 feet and still didn't lose signal.  The only bad part is, they most rate the 12 hours of battery life at a very low volume..  I have tested it the last few days.  I got about 6 to 7 hours out of this speaker with the volume just over half way on my phone.  The speaker is loud..  Just wish the battery lasted longer.

title: Not waterproof
body: I purchased this product during Covid shutdown 2020 since I was home most of the time and outside. Product states it is waterproof. Now, 2 years later, I dropped it in my swimming pool for the first time, and it turns off unexpectedly and also turns on unexpectedly. So, when it turns on unexpectedly, and I’m in the middle of a phone call, I have to turn off my Bluetooth in my phone settings so keep my calls private and not blasted through my JBL speaker. Asked seller for refund, but warranty has expired. Aside from this waterproof failure, I really enjoyed the speaker. Nice and loud and great sound quality.

title: You should have one. Or 2.
body: JBL has been doing sound for a long time and it shows. Even though all my old JBLs still work, I recently purchased this and a Charge 4 for the Party Boost. I should have just ordered two of these Flip 4s. It's a rocking little speaker that fills so much more space than it takes up. Totally love it.

title: Nice little speaker - not as “bass heavy” as Beats Pill
body: Nice little speaker. It’s the exact same size as the Beats Pill we have. The Beats Pill is much heavier in the bass. This Flip 4 is very comparable and seems to be a bit tougher built but we’ll see; it sits on the floor in the gym, so it may take a while.

title: Fun by the Pool
body: I hate to workout without music!  This little speaker was all I needed.  The sound is full, rich and has enough volume to be heard over the noisy pool equipment.  I love that it connects automatically when I turn it on.  Being waterproof makes it ideal to use by the pool.  Water aerobics can get splashy.

title: The most bang for your buck
body: For this price range I find the sound of this speaker to be excellent. It has an excellent range of sound concerning treble and base. I personally prefer this over the beats pill plus and I like the sort of fabric mesh that lays over the drivers. At the end it's like a hard rubber or tpu in case you drop it it'll take the shock of the drop. Over all, I am thoroughly impressed. If your wondering why I gave it only 4 stars it's because it's no sennheiser. The most bang for your buck and you can't tell it's cheap say like a soundbot model.  In the photos the blue USB is a separate cord, but still USB, and the Orange one is the one that is provided with the speaker. I found that to be unique and useful that the pin portion was flat versus the standard USB.

title: Little speaker with a big sound
body: I have an audio/video rental company and rent out a lot of JBL PRX and QSC equipment. Those are great for filling large venues. This little Flip 4 is great for personal use. This is perfect to bring along to the bedroom, kitchen, and hotel room. It gets plenty loud. It surprising has some deep end to it, but doesn't compare to something like a QSC K8 when it comes to lows. But that is OK because this wasn't meant to be used as a PA. Think of this as a premium personal speaker that you can throw in a bag. Bluetooth has been rock solid on my iPhone 8. The sound so far is warm compared to some cheaper smaller bluetooth speakers I've used. I really like the rubber push button to turn it on and off much better than the plastic toggle buttons used on other speakers. It feels more premium.

title: Quality
body: Sound quality

title: Love it!
body: Great little speaker with awesome sound quality and range.  I had a smaller non-waterproof speaker that I liked due to size, but with rain and usage on my kayak I really need a waterproof speaker and this guy fits the bill and works as a solid camp speaker in the evenings as well.

title: Perfect
body: This is a classic, high quality speaker with no frills. I don't worry about it getting wet at the beach, and it pairs quickly. I haven't tried the multiple speakers feature yet but that seems cool assuming you have several JBL speakers handy. Only thing I don't like is super minor, but the turning on and off sounds are oddly loud and don't match what the actual speaker volume is set for. Otherwise great, a bit heavy but no problem if you're just at home or driving to the beach/park.

title: Terrible battery life
body: When I used my speaker I charged it for a full 12 hours the night before my daughter had a volleyball tournament and the next day she used it for about thirty minutes and it died. Charged it again for one of her practices died within thirty minutes as well I don't know if this is common or if it's my outlet but I won't ever buy from JBL ever again this was a waste of my money. Also, the Bluetooth was decent it would come unconnected and make my phone start to glitch. Even when it wasn't connected to the speaker.

title: My favorite speaker
body: This was the 4th JBL Flip I've purchased.  One was a gift, but the other three live in my house. It may not be the most powerful portable speaker ever made, but it sounds great, travels easily, holds a charge for long enough to last through two consecutive nights of bonfires and brews, and the pairing process is super easy, too. What's not to love?

title: Great speaker
body: Gave this to my husband for Christmas.  He use it every day.  Charge last for 15 hours. My sister and  niece ordered them to.

title: A great buy... for the right price.
body: I got this JBL Flip 4 open box, and if I paid full price, I wouldn't have rated it so highly. However, with the discount, this is one of the best options available right now.Battery life is very good. I don't find myself charging this often, but on the occasion I have to, it's back to full capacity quickly.The sound itself is also great. However, I have found that the quality of the sound worsens at very low volumes. You'd probably be just as well off to play music through your phone speakers if you plan on using this thing to quietly play music.In conclusion, if you find a Flip 4 on discount, buy with confidence. It has served me well.

title: Powerful speaker in a little package.
body: I bought this speaker as a replacement for a speaker included in a video package.  The video package is for projecting images from inside a window for holiday displays.  The included speaker had a short battery life with little volume.  The JBL Flip 4 proved to be just the ticket.  Its battery life was great, lasted the entire evening with plenty left.  The volume was more than enough for people walking by to hear it plainly even though plenty of trick or treaters were yelling as they walked by.  And I didn't have the volume up to its maximum.  With its small size, I was able to hide it in a bush outside the window without being seen.  I look forward to finding more applications to use the JBL Flip 4.  A great value.

title: Flip4 Rocks
body: I purchased this after my Bose speaker that I had for 8 years died. I was really amazed at the sound quality that this speaker has. The connectivity to Bluetooth is seamless and easy. Battery life is pretty good compared to other speakers. A added bonus is that you can purchase other speakers and connect them together for a louder sound. I highly recommend this  product.

title: Great Speaker when not Paired
body: We bought a second speaker to connect with our first one that we have loved. The new speaker works great, but once they are connected, the song will skip every few minutes. When not connected, both speakers work great. Still happy with our purchase, just wish there wasn’t skipping. Could just be the speakers getting used to being connected so far.

title: Worth the money!
body: I love this speaker!

title: Amazing Sound
body: You get what you pay for...  The sound from this is amazing.  Deep bass.  Rich Treble.  Very convenient and sturdy.  Would absolutely suggest this as a purchse.

title: Excellent value and long battery life!
body: Bought this for my wife to listen to around the house. Borrowed it a couple of times for my own use. Good value for the price. Sound is very good. Battery life is excellent. Easy to connect bluetooth.Nits are that the associated app has little functionality and that we cannot control music from it (volume or advance).

title: Excellent
body: Very picky life-long professional musician here. I can vouch for this thing. Totally worth the money. Battery life was especially impressive, in my experience. Zero BT connectivity issues between multiple devices (including Apple and Android phones, old and new).

title: Boom boom boom
body: These speaker is amazing for the price you don't only get quality but you get payability. This speaker is small but loud and sounds like a full blown large speaker or subwoofer. The battery has lasted me more and a day at work where I work as a Montessori teacher to toddlers so needless to say we are listening to and singing with music all day long.

title: JBL delivers excellent quality
body: This is an excellent “on the go” speaker.Sound is crystal clear, and clean. The low end is the only drawback if you’re for more Bass, and not expected in such a compact system.

title: Would buy again.
body: This is by far the best "bang for your buck" speaker. Sound quality is excellent and is compact enough to take anywhere. Highs are crisp and clear and lows come through smooth and steady. Connected quickly with zero lag playing along with video. Battery was as advertised if not better. I used it three days moderately before recharge. I plan on picking up a few more to link together.

title: Great for summer time
body: I bought one of these as a christmas gift and one year later, asked for it for myself for christmas! The sound quality is great, the battery seem to last forever and the connectivity is fast and easy. My favorite part, though, is that it's waterproof! I love taking it to the pool and not having to get out and dry off my hands, find my phone, etc. just to change the song. It's great!

title: Great for outdoor workouts
body: This is my second JBL flip 4.  They may have a battery life expectancy of 2-3 years.  I am a mobile fitness trainer and use mine like crazy.  After 2-3 years, I was only getting through 1-2 workouts before I needed to recharge the battery.  Whereas I can usually go several days on one charge.  This puts out great sound for an outdoor workout without being offensive to others at an area park not involved with the workout.  And waterproof is a great added bonus for trips to the beach or if the rain sets in

title: great sound and perfect for active persons and water exposure.
body: ok I have 2 boys and a husband who loves music. We have been through our fair share of portable speakers. I even just in the last year purchased a small portable Bose (the small squarish one) and this speaker completely blows it away.This is actually our 2nd time to buy this one. The first one was for my son, and this one was for me. You can pair the 2 together and get great surround sound, they are handy by the pool, or water and seriously, they sound AMAZING!I was hesitant to get this as I did buy a bose less than a yr ago, but when I left it at work and borrowed my sons, I couldnt argue that this speaker far surpasses the one I had and it was slightly cheaper, My bose was 100 and this one was 79.

title: nice
body: i like it, only issue is that the battery dies somewhat fast. if you drive an older car like me and can't set up an aux of any kind and you want to use this as your main speaker, know it will die within 10-12 hours. beyond that, this is a phenomenal speaker

title: Great sound!!
body: I bought this for Father’s Day for my husband because he likes to play music when he’s out in the hot tub. It hangs easily on the shade umbrella and we don’t have to worry about the kids splashing it. I was amazed by the sound quality, including the bass!  As a bass player myself, this speaker does justice to my people!

title: Great speaker
body: It's small but packs an audible punch. Glad I bought it.

title: Bad product
body: Brought this device as a birthday gift for my niece. The unit stopped working after three months.

title: Best yet
body: Great bass. Clear sound without distortion. Bluetooth range is 5 stars.

title: Its JBL of course its good. UPDATED MAR/16/2021
body: This was probably the best thing I've gotten off Amazon in awhile if I could give it 10 stars I would. Its JBL I knew it was gonna be worth it ive had JBL subs in my car and they were awesome aswell yea I price is a little high but your 100% getting what you pay for high price for explanatory products. UPDATE Wednesday March 17th 2021 dude I've had this thing for awhile and omfg as you can see from my old post I loved it. NOW the second time taking it into the shower it won't turn back on. I seen a post from a guy who said he got one for his dad but it was refurbished and didn't have the water rubber seals, im not that smart so idk what I'm looking for, I also bought mine brand new, so yo hear that mine could have been short cutted pisses me off, I love this flip 4 so much that unfortunately if I can't get it running again. I'm gonna buy another and just not get it wet.

title: My son LOVES this!
body: Got this as a gift for my son and haven't heard a complaint. Great sound quality

title: Proved me wrong, I love it!
body: Wonderful sound and bass

title: Buy this Bluetooth speaker and forget the rest!
body: Incredible sounding Bluetooth speaker! Bought a 2nd to pair with it and never looked back. I blast them at the post office I work at when I’m sorting mail and packages and this thing(times 2) fills the space with such depth and clarity I’m amazed! Playing at 50% volume and they last a long long long time, playing at 100% and they last longer than expected. Worth every penny! Times 2!

title: Best Speaker
body: I have had 3 speakers, one stopped charging the other the battery life was horrible and had trouble connecting. This JBL speaker quality is so far above the the previous two speakers. The volume and quality sound are incredible. The charge time is minimal, and the battery life is outstanding. I bought a second speaker for my daughter. I use mine golfing, out on the boat, sitting around the fire, ice fishing, virtually anywhere. I recommend this speaker to anyone that asks.

title: Surprisingly good sound, especially with Viper4Windows
body: Out of the box, this speaker has decent sound: good bass for its size (not super powerful, but at you can tell what the bass line's doing). However, it sounds muffled, and of course the fact that its twin speakers are right next to each other doesn't do much for stereo separation or imaging. Comes with the territory of speakers this small, obviously. Fortunately, there's Viper4Windows or Viper4Android, free sound enhancers for PCs and Android phones. Viper's clarity effect deals nicely with the muffliness, and the 3D surround function (field surround on Android) adds some much-needed air. It's still not really compelling stereo, but it makes the listening more enjoyable, at least at close range (like at a desk).Speaker badly needs option to disable powerup/powerdown/bluetooth connect sound effects, and an option to stay powered on when plugged into USB power.

title: JBL never disappoints
body: Sound quality is amazing and I love the bass. The Bluetooth connects immediately when the device is turned on.

title: Good overall device
body: For the cost and included features, this device was well worth the money spent. I have not tested it’s water resistance but I would imagine it holds up as advertised

title: Will not pair with JBL flip 5
body: Compared to the JBL Flip 5 is inferior in sound quality.  If you plan on adding speakers know that the Flip 5 does not pair with this.  GOD bless

title: Muy buena
body: Excelente

title: Awesome Sound!
body: This is the second speaker that I know own. I loved the first one so much that I had to get another so I can link them and listen in multiple rooms at the same time. The lows, mids, and highs coming from this little speaker are the best that I have found in a portable bluetooth speaker.

title: Great Sound
body: This is my second Flip 4, I bought the second after getting such great use from the first. Good sound that rivals or exceeds Bose for 1/3 of the cost.Battery life is excellent.With 2 of them now I pair the 2 together for exceptional sound coverage.

title: Great sound and portability
body: Just what I needed for an outdoor patio speaker. Great sound, easy to connect and good battery life.

title: This is my second one
body: The sound quality is great for this little speaker.  It connects easily to our phones as well as our record player.  We enjoy the simplicity of it and the size too.  Small enough to throw in your bag while hiking, and loud enough to hear it while outside.  Overall we're happy with the product.

title: Excellent sound, build, battery and price from a reputable company
body: I bought this unit in discount from the treasure truck. For the price the sound quality, battery life and overall build quality of the Unit is fantastic.  I own a bose soundlink Mini and the bass is a bit better on that unit but it doesn’t match the JBL in overall flexibility and especially battery life.  I also found myself not wanting to bring the Bose places because it’s a bit more fragile.I would highly recommend this speaker to anyone looking to have a compact speaker under $100 that you can just turn on and forget about.

title: On its own it's great, if you want it doubled it sucks. Read below
body: I originally bought this speaker to connect with another JBL Bluetooth speaker, the charge4.Unfortunately, the app on your phone that you need to connect the two to put on either stereo or party mode is pretty much worthless.the speaker itself works great, don't get me wrong. The problem is the two speakers working together do not work together. One cuts out, or the other cuts out.  Tried troubleshooting it, tried fixing the situation with multiple ways and nothing works. It's the app that JBL puts out, it just sucks.so if you're buying this speaker as a standalone it works great if you're buying it to connect with another JBL product well don't waste your money go with a different brand.

title: hands free
body: i use it at work and in the car (hands free)

title: Love da boom.
body: Great size and dynamic sounds for a small portable speaker. I’m a Bose guy, but I give it up to JBL, this $100 dollar speak beats the Bose Bluetooth speak I bought at Costco for $150.

title: Received a Brick - AMAZON fixed the problem for me - LOVE JBL Flip 4
body: Well I received a dud. It won't start or power on straight out of the box. I've started a return immediately and Amazon is typically great about defective returns. But this was disappointing as I wanted to use it this holiday weekend. So in the spirit of transparency- I've ordered another one to arrive in two days. Will do another review when I receive the new one. Charging this one and there's no lights or power. Used a different cord from one included in case it was the power cord and no dice. So it's definitely the unit. I bought the black one as the blue one was backordered.UPDATE: Amazon sent me another JBL right out in the mail. Got it for the weekend and I LOVE this JBL. Sound is amazing. Waterproof is awesome. The only feature it's missing - is the ability to float. I've since bought 3 more of these.

title: It sounds good and it is really good
body: I like the sound quality of the jbl flip 4 wireless speaker and it is great product

title: Amazing Sound!
body: I’ve had other speakers before that we’re not at all good sound. I bought this cause it was JBL and I’ve had things that I’ve liked made by them before. I liked the sound so much that when my daughter talked about getting something like it, I ordered another one and had it sent to her and her husband. They love it!

title: Worth the money
body: My family loves it, perfect for home P.E work outs and out door gardening. Its perfect for bluetooth laptops with poor sound quality making movie watching more enjoyable ?. Only problem is the case. The outside is magnetic. LIFT THE TAB, DONT PULL IT. I had no idea the box was magnetic and thus the speaker fell out of its box, could have damaged it....

title: great sound
body: Has really clear, great sound. The battery is picky- sometimes it will stay charged for days (a few hours/day) and other times I charge it fully and it lasts half the time. It charges rather quick so this isn't a huge downfall.  I do wish it had an aux input.

title: Great speaker
body: Very crisp sound, good battery. Works great when paired with other JBL speakers. I have a charge 4 and 2 flips and it’s great for the backyard, by the pool.

title: Little speaker but amazing quality
body: Small speaker but it's a LOUD little thing & battery last for quite some time.

title: So glad I ordered this!
body: Great sound! It's easy to take on vacation or on my boat.

title: One of the best
body: This is one of the best bluetooth speakers anyone can get right now for the price. The built quality, overall sound, bass and bluetooth connectivity is top notch. The only issue I had was the battery life. I've been using this speaker for almost a year now and when I'm listening to music at full blast, it only lasts me about two hours. It was very easy to notice the difference from the first time I bought it vs now. If JBL works to master the battery life usage, I believe they could create the ultimate bluetooth speaker (s), if they already haven't yet.

title: The best in category
body: This speaker is not the smallest but the sound is good. The sound is not as clear as in a good stereo system but I did not expect it from a small single speaker. Nevertheless, the sound is good. It is warm and soft. I preferred it over UE that sounded more spacial and background. The base is not as low as I would like.It is easy to join 2 speakers into a stereo.I think that at the moment this speaker is the best portable bluetooth speaker. Maybe Sonos is better but they start at $400.

title: one of the most flawless pieces of technology i ever bought
body: this is by far one of the most flawless pieces of technology i’ve ever bought. i love this thing. i’m coming back to this page a year after i bought it to remark on how good of a product it is. just a delight to use. bravo to the people who built it. sounds incredible. the side woofers are amazing. so portable. the industrial design is slick. every part of it feels like quality. they really nailed it. the only regret with this thing is when i don’t have it with me

title: Amazing product!!
body: First 'played' with one of these speakers when my girlfriend's son visited. . . . then left his Flip 4 speaker at our house!  I started playing around with it: paired it to my I-phone. . . . and Whoa!!  I was blown away by the amazing fidelity, and presence of the sounds!  Extremely solid construction, and water proof as well!  I perform live music with students, and plan on using this great speaker to share pre-recorded songs, and background music for movement activities.JBL has always been one of the top audio manufacturers, and has again hit a 'home run' with this new device!

title: Over all pretty happy with it
body: I ordered two. They connect to each other easily and sound great. One does not want to charge though. Only works if it is plugged in and neither of them have a very good battery life. Definitely does not stay charged for 12 hours. Closer to two hours. But they are nice and sound good.

title: Good Gift
body: Gave to my brother for xmas and so far the speaker has connected fast, very loud even louder than our TV. Feel it's a good purchase for the price, will update if anything happens down the line.

title: Great sound! #JBL
body: Awesome sound quality.

title: What can I say it's a jbo great product
body: Love the product nothing bad to say

title: Loved it and still do.
body: Love this speaker. My favorite wireless speaker I've ever purchased. Crisp uppers, clear mids, and booming bass. Not to mention when paired with a travel case it is an amazing travel speaker. I always have the travel case latched to my travel backpack so its a zip up away for a trip or going out. Its a very sturdy speaker in regards to water and dropping. I haven't tested this but it is evidently water proof. It has a long battery life too. I can listen for a few hours and see now drop in its 4 or 5 battery level indicators. From what Ive read, the only speaker I would look at instead of this is its practically identical Charge 3 or 4? I guess its an even more powerful version of this speaker. Which is surprising because this thing is amazing.

title: Easy to pair with beautiful sound
body: I wanted to try something a little different in a bluetooth speaker. I'm a big Bose fan but my Bose color is a few years old and pretty banged up. The battery isn't holding a charge very long anymore so I decided a new speaker was in my future. I chose the JBL Flip 4 and I'm very pleased with my purchase. It pairs easily to my phone ( iPhone 8 ) and the battery life is fantastic. The sound is just as good if not a touch better than the Color. It is not meant to fill the room but it is very enjoyable to listen to. I'm very pleased with my choice.

title: Sounds good but limited functionality.
body: The most annoying thing about this speaker is the lack of track advance (at least) and fast forward/rewind buttons. The much cheaper Oontz speaker that this replaced had that functionality and sounded nearly as good.The JBL speaker wins in that it looks good, is very water resistant so we can use it near/in water without worry, and it really does sound great.The JBL speaker loses in that there is virtually no information on how to use the various bits of functionality that it has. There is an app that needs to be installed to "unlock" some of the advertised features too, which is annoying that it's not made clear up front. JBLconnect works ok but it's sort of "randomly push and hold buttons until everything is connected and hope that some other random bluetooth device doesn't connect first".Oh and the app requires location data to run. It shuts down if you deny it. The fact that an app like this needs your location to enable features that are advertised for this unit without asterisks is sketchy as hell. Plus the app basically sucks. Reading up on other JBL speakers and the apps that they require... It's probably time to put JBL into the "never buy this item because they force you to use software that they are not actually capable of creating." In other words, this will be my last JBL purchase ever.

title: This thing ROCKS!
body: Recommended by a bestie and bought right away. Love the clear and crisp sound and much more power and volume than any other bluetooth speaker I've tried. This is the first time I've spent over 20 bucks on one and it's worth it. Just ordered a case to protect when not in use. Enjoying my new speaker quite a bit!

title: JBL switching to PartyBoost  buyer beware!
body: Great little speaker but unfortunately JBL is switching away from connect+ (which this and most others have from JBL) to "Party boost" for connecting more than one speaker around the house or yard at the same time. JBL is making ALL their speakers obsolete with pairing to newer speakers. The flip 5 is only the current model that has jumped to part boost so far. The software is not fwd or backwards compatible so either stick with the older models or buy the newest ones..which haven't all come out yet. Really a let down. Terrible decision to not make them all talk together.

title: Works great
body: it's a jbl and it sounds like it should

title: Great sound, lightweight yet sturdy, great battery life
body: Really happy with this purchase. I live by myself, so I don't need a super fancy audio set up because I'm usually using headphones. That said, I wanted something I could use outside when I have friends over to grill in the summer. This has worked perfectly so far, the battery life is long, and the sound quality is stellar for its size. Really nicely balanced. An added benefit that I didn't anticipate is the fact that I can use it to listen to podcasts/audio books as I'm falling asleep and plug in my phone in another room entirely. (When I plug my phone in in my bedroom overnight, I end up wasting a bunch of time in the mornings.) The battery lasts for several nights this way. (I do use my sleep timer on 30 or 45 minutes.)

title: Sounds good, but battery seems faulty In some
body: I love the JBL Flip. This is my second Flip 4, the first one rattled after a hard fall, so I decided to get this to replace it. The speaker sounds great, and when they are new the battery life is good; however, this speaker was barely over a year old when the battery started to not hold a charge any longer. It would show that it was fully charged, but after about an hour of use it would die. It’s obviously an issue with the battery. I went ahead and just bought another one, but I feel like they should last longer.

title: Great speaker
body: Great sound, battery lasts a very long time. I have one and bought one for my mom and aunt, both were very satisfied as well.

title: I like it !
body: The sound of this little speaker is amazing! I listen to Spotify all day connecting my phone with this speaker via Bluetooth (which was as easy as turning on the speaker and selecting the speaker on my Bluetooth devices in my phone) It fills my studio with music without trouble. It has enough power to raise the volume to unnecessary loud levels. I also tested it as a speakerphone and calls were very clear and people listened to me clearly as well. On the down side, the cable it comes with is short (mostly for recharging the speaker than keeping it plugged). It doesn't come with a carrying case although the box is pretty fancy and could be kept as a case. The user manual comes in so many languages that it's hard to figure out but since I had other Bluetooth speakers before I knew what to do.

title: been put thru the tests....
body: Well i didn't have this for 3 hours when i dropped it in the mud. whiped off , fine. then maybe week later in straight down pour and came out fine. it is my garage speaker its been dropped,stepped on, black finger prints from dirt on it. It still great charge and the sound quality is great!!

title: Great sound!!!
body: The speaker sounds really great!!!

title: Worth the price !
body: I had been eying this speaker for a while now and finally purchased it. The first time I bought it, it worked great, everything worked until I attempted to charge it. Apparently the port to charge it with was loose and I wasn’t able to use it, so I called Amazon Support (11/10 for service!), and they were able to connect me with a manufacturer to get me a replacement free of charge. I received the new one and I haven’t had any problems since! Great for just chilling in your room alone, with friends, get togethers, and more!

title: Great Buy!!
body: This speaker is a great buy. The sound is clear and a lot louder than I thought. I can use it in the shower with no problems at all! It's really easy to use and comes in a box that I could keep as a case for it, there's even a place for the charger in the box.

title: Perfect travel speaker
body: This speaker has sufficient power and quality of sound for most occasion. It’s a small and water resistant package that makes it very convient for traveling, poolside afternoons and beach trips, or even dinner out on the patio with the fam.  Colors are fun too.

title: Portable, Easy to Use...I'm a Fan
body: We used to have this big, clunky speaker 2-in-1 combo that had a detachable, portable speaker...and then the dog ate through the cord. RIP. The JBL Flip is a powerful little speaker that's great for toting around the house or outside or wherever you're listening to things. I has the sound output of a bigger speaker with convenience and portability. I can hear it playing from the other end of the house, and it seems to have decent range when connected to the phone. I can pretty much go anywhere in my house without it dropping or stuttering. It's easy to use and sync with devices, too, which can be a weak point with bluetooth-connected devices. I haven't paid enough attention to the battery life, but so far it seems pretty reasonable compared to my dearly-departed speaker.

title: Great bluetooth speaker, no regrets
body: This speaker is awesome. It's my first JBL and I've had it for over a month now. Battery life is great, the sound is great even with heavy base. Music has a nice full sound and it can get very loud. I also  listen to a lot of audio books and this speaker makes it much easier to hear while moving from room to room and voices are not distorted. I love that there is the potential to sync with other JBL speakers.My one con isn't even a serious one. I don't think it has the connection range that I heard claimed on some YouTube reviews. I took my phone across the house (I live in small home so it wasn't that far) and the speaker cut out a bit.Very pleased with my purchase.

title: Great for cycling
body: Bought this due to the connect+ feature to connect with my teammates on bike rides - and because it was a great deal on Black Friday. I haven't used that feature yet as winter has stopped all of our team rides, but I've taken it out on my own several times and it is GREAT. The sound quality and volume have topped any of the several other speakers I've tried and it's gone through mud and slush with no difficulties. On top of that, the battery life is great - I use an old iPod Touch for music when I ride to avoid killing my phone battery and the speaker outlasts the iPod's battery life. Very excited to get lots of use on the trails without having to charge it every single time!

title: Best blue tooth speak I've owed
body: Awesome sound, size and shape.  Love this to put in drink holder of camp chair etc.  I've had cheaper speakers that sound as good but I think the difference in paying more is for the superior battery

title: JBL flip 4
body: Brought this for my wife and she immediately fell in love with it. Sound quality is equal to a small tv sound bar and rivals a boom box. It’s solidly built but not heavy or bulky, has a nice feel and the black is so sleet. Battery life is great, charged it once, she played music all day and into the night. We love it

title: The sound quality is AMAZING! Size is perfect! LOVE IT!
body: The sound quality is AMAZING! Size is perfect! LOVE IT!

title: Content
body: Love it... Just wish it came with a wall charger.

title: LOVEEEEEEEEE
body: I love this speaker, I purchased a case which houses the USB cord. I use this speaker daily up to 8 hours a day and the sound is great! I've also put this speaker in bike water holder, perfect fit. You can connect other JBL speakers altogether, charge and play the speaker at the same time. It has also taken  a few dives with floating the Texas rivers and no need to put it in rice!

title: Delivers On Sound and Battery Life Quality
body: It’s become an extension of my phone.  Carry it everywhere inside and out to listen to my music.  Very quick to connect.  Great sound from a compact speaker.

title: Terrific for Indoor Amplification
body: This is a great speaker. It's portable, connects well to bluetooth, and lasts for days with a single charge. This version works best indoors (the audio tends to get drowned out by the wind), so if you're in the market for an outdoor speaker, I'd suggest getting the next model up. Again, the key feature of this model is its portability.

title: Cute, but too much bass
body: Nice little speaker, but too much bass which is not adjustable.

title: Big Sound In A Small Package
body: I’ve owned one of the first generation flips for many years.  I have always been impressed with the sound produced by my older flip and the Flip 4 is just as impressive.I bought two so I could take advantage of the Connect+ features.  Then I decided I could replace an old set of Wireless party speakers I’ve had for several years with these, so I bought two more.  They sound terrific and fill my home and yard with clear deep music when I use them.Their small size, weight and clean lines make them easy to take with me or pack safely out of sight.I’m likely to buy more of these to fill more of my home with their impressive sound.

title: Easy to use, sound isn't impressive
body: Physically the size and shape are good, although it is rounded on the bottom for some reason. Pairing was quick and easy with a Android phone. I am not impressed with the sound. I've been a JBL fan for years, but this speaker sounds mushy. No distinct highs and lows. Maybe it's the type of music I play on it(mostly rock), I don't know. It is definitely better than my phone speaker, but still far below even basic bookshelf speakers. On sound alone I'd give it a 3.

title: Who thought an Bright ORANGE charging cord was a good idea?
body: The product is fine - but who thought that a bright orange charging cord was a good idea?  Seriously.  Unless your home is bright orange, you'll need to hide this when it is charging.

title: Big sound in a small package
body: I have been tired of the crappy sound coming from my phone, so I decided to try the flip and I love it. The sound is amazing, you can hear the bass notes as long as you understand that its not meant to be played at full volume. Crystal clear sound  at an affordable price. Worth the purchase.

title: JBL Flip 4, Black - Waterproof
body: Excellent sound

title: Waterproof Excellent Sound!
body: Great product, sounds amazing, and is definitely waterproof!  I take it out on my boat and have never been happier with the sound quality and peace of mind I get from knowing water won’t hurt it!  As long as you attach it to the boat or something that floats you have zero to worry about!Can use this version as a speaker phone as well. It’s not crystal clear, but it’s better than having to pick up your phone while driving a boat!10/10 would recommend!

title: High Quality, Low Quantity
body: The JBL Flip 4 has great positives, but some noticeable negatives.- The sound quality is great, and volume is good for the price. I listen to music all over the map, from Metal to Rap and it does a solid job capturing all sounds.- Its super easy to connect to, and is very simple to set up. Pretty easy navigation.-The battery life is the kicker. It says 12 hours, but you may only get that with the lowest volume. If you want to blast music that has heavy base, its going to last you maybe 4 hours. As someone who works in the construction industry, I was looking for something that could last an entire work day. This speaker cannot. However, for the casual listener, this is a great buy!

title: GET THE PROTECTION PLAN
body: PAY THE LITTLE BIT EXTRA FOR THE PROTECTION PLAN. I don't usually do reviews but the reviews helped me purchase this item. I would have given a 5 start if mine stayed working. It worked fine when I got it and I loved it!. It sat unused for the winter. the other day turned it on. It came on but the Bluetooth would not connect. I gooled it and it seems that happens a lot with these. But what they said to do didn't work. Then It would not come on unless I had it connected to power. Very frustrating!!!! Well I had purchased the 4 year Asurion Protection plan for around 11.00 and It was one of the easiest things I had ever done. They are sending me stuff to send it back and giving me a full refund.

title: Best Bluetooth speaker with microphone I've ever owned.  Quality sound!??
body: So glad I bought this. Transitions smoothly between playing music and then acting as a speakerphone for a call. No one has ever complained that I "have them on speakerphone" when I'm using this, and that's saying a LOT. My boyfriend absolutely hates speakerphone, yet he doesn't mind this one.  Highly recpmmend!

title: Great performance
body: Impressive sound quality & volume. Excellent value. Highly recommended.

title: High quality little speaker!
body: Significant upgrade from the Aomais Sport (which was also very good and cheap!) The bass and general sound quality is superb, for such a small speaker. It always picks up on the Bluetooth connection with my phone with no hassle. Long battery life: I listen for probably an hour or two every day, and I go several days in between charges. Controls are easy to use. I haven’t paired it with another JBL speaker yet, but I like that that is an option for a stereo or a synced multi-room experience. I’m glad I spent a few extra bucks for this one.

title: Not totally waterproof but really a great speaker.
body: The only reason I’m giving this four stars is the sound and connectivity is really good,  the only issue is the whole “ water proof” part of it?? What does this mean exactly? Yes it did take a drink in a river and now it won’t power up, yes it was submerged in water few a minute maybe. Be very careful that yours doesn’t take a dunk into the toilet or any water. Other than that it’s a great speaker!

title: Sounds really nice
body: It is a must have

title: Big, Portable Sound
body: We love our JBLflip4. Very handy in our car on road trips. Volume buttons are self explanatory. Good high notes and great low notes. Perfect size for us. Great value.

title: Very nice.
body: Delivers everything good in a Bluetooth speaker.

title: use as wired speaker
body: love this speaker.  nice sound quality.  use it for my phone and laptop.  i have a 3 foot  cable to connect  and this size is good.  battery life seems good.  i listen 1 hour or so per day..no issue with charge

title: Great Sound from Small device!
body: I've only had 1 other cheap Bluetooth speaker, that i then attached to a Google Chromecast Audio  dongle, in the hopes that i could then purchase ANOTHER cheapy bluetooth speaker and ANOTHER Chromecast audio dongle in order to get crappy stereo sound.In the case with this JBL we cut out all the extra wires and setup for a very sleek , very small, yet very nice sounding speaker, that can eventually be linked with 100 other "connect+" devicesAlthough this will only work in Stereo mode with a 1X1 configuration, and "party" mode with 100 devices, i still find this very attractive.There are many videos comparing quality , size, "water-proof-ness" etc.. of the top Sony, vs Anker (budget) vs JBL, the sound quality in all of those makes this Flip 4 amazing, its clear, and warm and crisp.Would recommend

title: Love It
body: This every thing I expected and the red color is phenomenal.

title: Better than my mom's Bose
body: I was really surprised by the sound and bass that came from this speaker.  I didn't want to spend a lot on a Bose speaker. I didn't love the quality of my mother's Bose Bluetooth speaker anyway though its a few years old.  This was perfect. I highly recommend.

title: Battery life was great while it lasted.
body: I enjoyed this product the first few months. I ordered it 8/6/21 and I’ve noticed these past few days (written 11/28/2021) that the battery life has diminished. It used to be able to play for 12 hours straight and still have some life left in it but now I play music for 2 hours and it has a low battery despite being fully charged prior to use. I wish I bought a sound bar instead of this. Feels like a total waste of money. And I’ve owned it only for 4 months.

title: Great!  Warning, keep it clean...
body: I love this speaker!  My husband gave this to me as a gift for my birthday.  I take it everywhere and the color is super cute.  The outer portion is plastic except for the area that covers the speaker.  Unfortunately, we have 4 kids and someone's dirty hands (with brownie crumbs) touched it and it's very noticeable.  Still works great, of course!  If you have little ones or any person around you with potentially dirty hands, be warned.  Ha!  May want to get the black instead. :)If you appreciated this review and if you enjoy other great deals, you can follow me on IG @prettycheapmama!Happy shopping!Pretty Cheap Mama

title: Not as advertised !
body: My old JBL lasted 2 days on the job (16 hrs) - before recharge - this one died 3 days consecutively after only 5 hours !

title: Bad for aux cable use
body: When used with aux cable, the unit will automatically turn off if the music is too quiet.  This results in the beginning of songs being cut off or the song cutting out during a quiet part;  this is especially problematic with movies.  The rest of the functionality is ok, but I did not expect such a broken "power saving" feature...

title: Blue tooth speakers with great sound
body: I bought the larger version of this a couple years ago. Loved it so much I decided to buy the smaller version hoping the sound quality would be good. I love these little speakers!! They have great sound!! They are so easy to use, small and easy to pack in a purse and a great price too!! You won't be disappointed.

title: Nice speaker
body: I’ve had & used this little baby 6-8 months not. The sound is great even at higher volumes although I’ve never maxed it out. I hope it lasts at least a couple or few years. Otherwise, I’ll re-review it but I would buy this again it!

title: Great sound for the price!  Design could use a small tweak!
body: Great sound!  I'm thrilled with the quality of the speakers and sound for the price.  I'm not an audiophile, just wanting some decent sound, and it certainly delivers that for me. I like the fact that I can take it around water and not worry so much.  Pros:  Looks and sounds great. Weight is heavy enough to make me think that it's well-made, and light enough to feel comfortably portable.  Cons:  I don't like it's complete cylindrical design because it rolls in such a way as to cause the power, volume, and connection ports to end up on the bottom (backside) out of easy reach.  But, it's not a deal breaker for me because I'm pleasantly satisfied with the other features.  It's just a small inconvenient annoyance. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.

title: Great product
body: I love this bluetooth speaker. I use it for hours at a time. Battery holds up great. The sound is awesome.  I bought 2 more for my daughters. This will not disappoint you!

title: Great sound, solid Bluetooth connectivity and easy to set up
body: This Bluetooth Speaker sounds great.  The Bluetooth connection is solid 10's of feet away from my iPhone.  The set up is easy, in spite of the unnecessarily complex instructions.  Instructions must have been written by a non-english speaker.

title: Love this speaker!
body: This speaker is great! I also Have the Bose Sound Link. Both speakers are great. I think the Bose is more attractive and subtle but this one may take the lead in clearness and sound quality. If you are on the fence, buy it!!! You will not regret it!

title: Love the sound
body: Sound is great. Nice clear full sound for various music genres. Battery life has been very good. It charges pretty fast and maintains a charge for hours. Very convenient speaker. Also has nice bass.

title: Loud, clear, durable
body: This is the best Bluetooth speaker I've owned--and I've gone through many. I'm not an audiophile by any means, but I listen to a lot of different kinds of media on this. Great for a variety of music (even bass which small speakers like this don't tend to do well with), podcasts, and movies on my computer. It's clear, never crackly, and I've never come close to maxing out the volume.Small enough to throw in a bag, and the battery life is so good that I sometimes forget to charge it for upwards of a week.

title: Love the speaker
body: Love the Bluetooth speaker sounds so good and really good quality it’s last long too

title: Blown away by the powerful sound
body: Honestly I bought this as a Christmas gift for my partner and I was so jealous ?? The sound on this speaker is so powerful! I love the vibrant red although I wanted the black one.. it’s portable, charges quickly and connects with all tablets computer and phones easily. This was one of the best speakers I’ve ever purchased.. it’s definitely worth every penny! I would advise getting a case for it especially if you work in a hands on field. It can get dirty, and it’s not a good look on the bright red. Otherwise it’s amazing! JBL is the best!

title: Battery life
body: When it is plugged in it works great. It does not keep a charge at all.

title: Great speaker for the value.
body: Love this speaker. I’m not a speaker enthusiast. If you want something that is clear and has good volume output, get this. I use it for when I’m cleaning around the house, cooking, or working outside in the yard or on my vehicle. Holds a charge well and lasts decently long depending on how loud you play music. I have not tested out the waterproof feature other than it was outside during a light rain. Do not get white unless you feel like you can keep it clean and grease free. That was my only mistake.

title: Love it.
body: My son had bought one of these little speakers and he loves it. Well I decided to purchase one and I am very happy. For a small speaker it has great sound. I only listen to jazz and I never listen to loud music. My wife loves Motown, that's what we grew up on. Well she listens to Motown when she does her daily workouts and she decided to crane up the sound. This little speaker even sounds good when the volume is all the way up. Another plus is the ability to hold a charge and it's waterproof. We took this out on our canoe and it was playing for over 4 hours, that evening I listen to it for another 5 hours and it was still going strong.

title: Good for Work
body: I got this for my boyfriend for work. He works with fiber optics in his truck or sometimes outside and he uses it everyday. He said the quality and battery life are 4 stars. I’d say thats pretty good.

title: Brand new and works like a charm.
body: I already had a JBL flip 4, and I wanted another one for my work truck, because the Flip 5's don't have a built in mic for answering calls. This one works great.

title: Ultra sound *
body: My Treblab  HD7 recently quit on me and purchased the JBL  flip 4  as the replacement.Even though it looks very similar to the Treblab, it is a totally different sound box and I meanfar superior in all aspects.  If you are in the search for a speaker as such, I would highly recommendthis model. Very happy with purchase - puts the Treblab to shame......

title: Impressive!!
body: Purchased this speaker to play music when we’re entertaining guests on our deck or in the pool. Took it out of the box, tuned it on, connected it to my iPad, and played the first song I had on my playlist. Sound quality is AMAZING!! It’s not fully charged when it arrives so I can’t comment on the battery life. It’s sturdy, easy to figure out even without reading the instructions, and comes neatly packaged in a reusable magnetic box. I can’t wait to use it more!!

title: WOW!!!
body: I bought the portable JBL Flip 4 for my patio rather than mounting outdoor speakers.  It's perfect!  The sound has great clarity and amazing sound for its size!!  I typically only need to have the volume set at 40-50% which greatly extends the battery.  I absolutely love this speaker!!!

title: Good price , amazing sound, and delivered within 4 days !
body: JBL-4 has an amazing sound . I bought one 3 years ago, and tried changing the battery disastrously.  The cost of new JBL-4s through this vendor was more reasonable compared to Target, Walmart and Best Buy!  I’m  so content with this model that I don’t really need to spend extra bucks to get the latest ;  I did , however buy two of the JBL-4s ; one for me to play in my backyard and one for my teenage music -loving son .  I don’t like to share !

title: Great Unit
body: Bought this as a dual purpose computer and on the go unit. It sounds great hooked up to my computer, I did figure out that if you power it via plug and not usb it stays connected. Via usb it drops after 30 minutes if plugged in.

title: Good Sound and Pairs with Multi Devices
body: I got this speaker cause my coworkers had Jbl Flip 4 and 5. So I got the 4 and I love the pattern. My other speaker which was Altec Lansing could not pair with my computer when it paired with my phone but this speaker you can pair with multi devices. Recommend seriously, no cap.

title: Ish bangs
body: Just got this guy today, so giving a review based on initial impressions. Will update if there are any issues. Perfect size. Compact enough to be thrown in a bag or even carried in hand, but big enough to have some solid base and sound. It feels sturdy and had some nice packaging.  It connected with my phone and laptop pretty much instantly. None of that bluetooth bs. So far I'm very happy with it. My only gripe is that it only comes with a charging wire and not the plug.

title: Super Sound
body: I was very surprised by the sound quality. I definitely recommend this bluetooth speaker.

title: Not the sound quality I expected
body: I decided to go cheaper and relied on the JBL brand. Sound is OK, but not nearly as good as the UE Boom 2 I have.

title: Great speaker
body: When i buy something i always focus on price/quality combination. In this case for a speaker under $100!!!!!! No question asked.Of course if you want to run a party for 100 people on your 2 acre back yard you need something stronger but obviously get ready at least $300.

title: Still The Best ??
