 One of the best speakers you can buy. FW update gives you a little more bass. The size the sound the speakerphone everything is great on this speaker. This is my 5th Flip 4. Rather have this than a Flip 5. Looks great in white. Still the champ in this size and category. Crisp clear and a deep rich bass for this size.

title: Love it!
body: This is portable, light weight, with a full sound. I use it every day at work and at home.

title: ... this speaker for about two months now and I love it. I can hang it from a tree ...
body: I've been using this speaker for about two months now and I love it.  I can hang it from a tree during a party and it fills the back yard pretty well.  I can take it out on the water and it can fall into the water and I don't have to worry about it.  I even started leaving it in my office to charge because the sound and bass are really nice.  Not enough to blow away your home theatre speakers but really surprising for this things size and price.To top this all off, battery life is fantastic!  I've never had an instance where I've run out of battery life or even had to worry about that.  I've left it on during parties for more then 8 hours without issue.Overall an amazing speaker!

title: Nice portable take with you everywhere speaker
body: Same day shipping.  Have only used once.  The sound quality is great & the speaker projects well outdoors despite it's size.  My concern, based on other reviews, is how much play time I get between charges - only time will tell.  I'll edit & update this review as necessary.

title: A great small speaker...better than expected for it's size...
body: I have two Charge 3 units with which I have been very pleased.  I purchased the Flip 4 for a smaller space, but was surprised to find that it sounds very nearly the same.  This is a fine small easy to tote Bluetooth speaker.  It's a good value and covers the frequency spectrum uniformly.  It is neither peaky nor strident.  It sounds about as good as a speaker this size can possibly sound.  I doubt I'll be testing the waterproof characteristics of it any time soon...under water is not my preferred listening venue.  I bought the white one (my Charge 3's are black) and the unit "looks" great.  I've used JBL for over 50 years (before Harman Kardon got in the act) and it is brand worthy of my trust.

title: Outstanding
body: Sound quality is off the chain for such a small speaker! We LOVE IT ! Now my 16 year old wants one. My mom got this same one as a gift. I was so impressed I bought it for my boyfriend and we can both enjoy it! It’s a win win!

title: Fantastic Speaker
body: I spent lots of time reading reviews and weighing the pros and cons of the $100 Bluetooth speakers market. I settled on the JBL Flip 4 in early summer, and it was a great decision! Like stated in the product description the battery life is phenomenal. I generally don't listen on more than half volume and I'll go weeks without charging. The design is sleek and functional, and its small size means you can bring it everywhere and put it anywhere. The sound is very good in all varieties of of music, I listen to rap, country, rock, jazz, big band, choir, really anything sounds great. I really like the red color, it pops in every environment so you won't forget it on the beach or on a rock by your camp fire. Fantastic speaker for its price and size!

title: Solid Speaker
body: I only use this speaker while I’m in the shower. I never tested the waterproof capabilities though and I don’t plan too. Sound is good considering the size, Bass is there but about what you’d expect from a speaker this size. Battery life hasn’t irritated me.

title: Battery life sucks
body: Bought 2 pcs (one for my bro as a present) in 2018. We were completely satisfied by speaker's quality, but, after 3 years both of units dropped their battey life suddenly, means, after being fully charged after 1/2 hour of usage it just shuts down. Once plugged to recharge, almost immediately shows full charge, but then again, all that repeats... Our time of enjoying the product appeared to be very short.

title: Great sound!
body: This thing is great. I owned the bigger size, but bought the small one for travel. Love it. Plenty loud for your hotel room or balcony or beach or pool without being too annoying to others. Sound quality is fantastic. I haven’t tried to dunk it under water or anything. Battery will last several hours

title: LOVE THIS!
body: This speaker sounds awesom and for something so small I was very pleased. It arrived quickly, and was really easy to pair to my phone. I will be getting the larger size soon so I can pair it with my TV and when you have 2 of the same brand you can pair the 2 of them.

title: Great for what it is
body: I'm not a sound buff who sits in a chair savoring the true reproduction of a musical sound track, I just want something to push out a decent sound without distortion while I'm working in my workshop. This does a great job. The sound is full and satisfying. It's easily portable with several hours' battery life. I usually run it from my mobile phone, and the bluetooth connection is dead easy. You can control the volume on either the speaker or the phone.  I like that when a phone call comes in the music is muted, but I don't love that the phone call sound comes through the JBL device. I hope there's a simple way to prevent this, I just haven't bothered to look. All round, it's a great product.

title: Look no further than JBL!
body: I'm convinced that JBL produces the BEST portable/compact Bluetooth speakers ever!  The sound quality is AWESOME for such a low price.  I'm using this for my jet ski and it really fits well.  This speaker is good for multiple rugged outdoor conditions.  If it were possible on Amazon, I'd rate it with 17 stars.

title: It has a short, sometimes works, sometimes doesn't
body: I bought this back in January, and I didn't love it even at first. The base is way too basey, and the volume was super lacking. But after a couple of months, it started shorting out. I'd be listening to a program, and it would cut out. The only way to fix it was to turn the thing off and re-start it, and there was still no guarantee that it would work. Now, 8 months later, all of these issues seem to have increased. The base drowns out the treble to the point I have a hard time making out words in songs, the volume is lower than at first, and it shorts out all the time now. Definitely a lemon.

title: Amazing Quality, Durable Design, Absolutely Perfect.
body: Unbelievable sound quality in a super durable device. I've been a Bose customer exclusively for many years, however, after replacing my Colorwave speaker for the 3rd time, I decided to venture out and give JBL a shot. I'm honestly only disappointed I didn't make this move sooner. Simply cannot go wrong with this speaker.

title: Great sound, easy set up, extremely portable
body: I've bought a couple of these JBL speakers, which are not the cheapest of their category, but seem to have far superior sound to the others I've heard. It 's handsome and durable little product which paired easily via BlueTooth to my computer. No batteries -- it's charged via USB cable. I haven't tried it underwater, but seems fine on land.

title: Great portable speaker with great color
body: I ordered the teal version for my wife as a mother's day gift because it's her favorite color and this speaker had generally favorable reviews.  A lot of other portable speakers have unattractive designs or color options, but this hits the mark.  Pairing via bluetooth was easy on an iPhone XR and Android phone.  I have not tested the app, but it's not needed unless you want more advanced options or pairing multiple speakers.  Speaking of, this speaker has the ability to connect to other JBL speakers to create a sort of surround sound environment.I'd highly recommend this speaker to anyone looking for one.  Charges via micro usb and holds a charge for a long time.

title: It works every time
body: This is the best blue tooth speaker I’ve had. It’s my forth try. What I love is that it connects every time, I never have to fight with it like I did with the bose.  I was a little tossed up about the sound quality, this has more percussion than the bose but the bose has a fuller mid-range. I decided to go for the percussion because it works & for exercise percussion may be more important anyway. I sure wish I could marry the 2 for sound purposes.

title: Awsome
body: My roommate had one and it kicks ASx!! So good I had to get my own, You should too. Big sound!!!

title: wonderful
body: For about the size of a soda can you can have amazing sound quality

title: It's worth it!
body: I bought it for my son 15yo for his soccer self-practice. He and his friends loves that speaker! I thought it is little expensive but sound quality is awesome and battery life is quite good! One of the best stuff I bought it for him!

title: Gift for dad. Decent speaker with decent battery and sound not super loud but a good loud speaker.
body: Great for the price. 5 stars is a high bar. So I give it 4

title: Easy to use
body: Use for music outside

title: It's OK
body: The sound is really good. But the sound doesn't match up with the lips when you're using bluetooth... which is more of a bluetooth problem overall. If I had known I would've tried to get an RF wireless speaker.Also, the bass is so loud you have to turn it off to listen to movies. But it won't turn the bass off from the PC it has to be turned off from the speaker which requires you to hold the bluetooth and lower volume button at the same time for like 15-20 seconds. Which is a pain in the ass and something the instruction booklet didn't tell you about.Besides that, it sounds pretty darn good. The battery lasts a long, long time.

title: Not bad, but far from perfect
body: Optimum battery life only lasted about 3 months. It’s already beginning to struggle holding a charge. One of the cones broke within three days. The speakers cannot handle heavy bass.

title: Great gift and fantastic sound
body: I bought this JBL because my son has the upgraded version.  I LOVED the sound quality from that do when my husband said he wanted one like his but smaller. I purchased this and a case to protect it. He was very happy. Just what he wanted.

title: Great value
body: Great value

title: Such a great speaker, we bought a second one!
body: We purchased one after seeing positive references to the Flip 4 on every other bluetooth speaker review.  We were so impressed with the Flip 4, we bought a second one.Bottom Line:  A GREAT speaker.  Highly recommend.The sound quality is superb (inside and outside), volume is excellent, Battery lasts, and the build is outstanding.Love that it's water-, dust-, sand- proof and can be washed with some dish soap.Ended up buying a second one - and while the party/stereo feature of two sounds even better - a single one sounds nearly as good as having the two.We also have a Sonos Play 1 - and the Flip 4 matches (and may exceed) the sound quality of the Sonos.Overall, a GREAT speaker.

title: It's great sound
body: Best sound for size

title: The sound is great! The two-device system is flawed however
body: The sound is great!  The two-device system is flawed however.  If my wife is using the speaker, and I am in the house and get a text message, then my phone overrides hers on the speaker.  So one of the phones has to be totally disconnected from the speaker or you end up with a battle of phones.And it doesn't have to be that way.  I have a set of inexpensive bluetooth headphones that handles two devices flawlessly - on those headphones 2 devices can be paired to it at once, and the 2nd NEVER overrides the first.  If I stop the music on the first device, then sound from second can come through.JBL, a leader in audio, should have figured this out already.

title: Portable, waterproof & amazing sound volume!!!
body: I play music in the morning for students entering the building, it slips right into my pocket and blasts like I'm at a concert!

title: Doesn't work anymore
body: This worked great for a few years but has since stopped working and is now nothing more than a paper weight. :(

title: Blast Your Doors Off!!!
body: This blue-tooth speaker blew ALL my teeth off. Very powerful, although my Dentist is quite upset. Don’t let them tell you size matters. This speaker is so powerful, I plan to use the sonic blast to blow open the Safe door on my best Vegas-Casino heist.

title: Cute but loud!
body: This thing is the bomb! I contemplated buying a small speaker for long time and I am glad that I went with this when I finally decided to pull the trigger. Killer quality and has a little subwoofer built in! Also, I really love the outside pattern - it sets my apart from all my friend's.

title: After using for 2 months not hold the charge
body: Sounds is good but not hold the charge

title: Good speaker
body: Its a good speaker for sure. The Bluetooth is great, you don't have to reconnect every time, just turn it on and hit play. You can Bluetooth phone calls/talk thru it which i like a lot. The down side is its not a 12 hour battery. Mine last 8 jors max and when its cold it only last about 4 hours . Other than the battery life in happy with it

title: Blech
body: Bottom line is it does not sound good. There is no EQ, and the crossover is very poorly tuned. Great if all you want is 1k-4k. Bass & low mids are non-existent. Distorts at low volume. Maybe if you bought a subwoofer, too. Very disappointed, as I chose JBL due to satisfaction with past products. Super non-helpful documentation and product support online.

title: Satisfied!
body: Great Great speaker. Connects very fast, superb sound quality.

title: Great Product! Couldn't be more impressed.
body: I could not be more impressed with this product. The sound quality is excellent and the sound levels are impressive. Its so easy to pair with your phone and best part is, IT CAME CHARGED. JBL is doing it right!UPDATE: Still so so happy with this speaker and the battery lasts a very long time, I have listened for 12+ hours at times and the battery still has a fourth charge. And the LED battery life indicators are a big help for when you need to see how much power it has left. The amazing sound of these is impressive. And I have since bought another for a friend because I was so impressed with it. I would recommend this speaker to anyone looking for a good reliable Bluetooth Speaker. Cost 100, would  definitely buy even if it was 200

title: Tough, Waterproof, Compact, Sounds Good, Perfect in the golf cart.
body: Should have written a review of this months ago. I bought this because it was water proof and I like to have it with me on the golf course. It is well made and tough and the sound quality and amplification is great. Fits in the cup holder of a golf cart. Battery lasts at least 5 hours with conituing play. I liked the one I bought for my golf bag so much I bought another one for my office. My friends like it so much 5 of them have bought one for themselves. JBL has always been recognized as a quality speaker manufacture, this lives up to the legend. As good as a Bose mini ant less than half the price. You will not be disappointed.

title: I love this speaker
body: It is sturdy, loud, and doesn't complain when the battery is low, it just has that light. That red light that says "Hey; charge me, man. I'm down in volts."Great speaker, and that it connects to others like it is way more fun that running cables.Me human that can typing this review.

title: Great choice and great investment
body: It’s a very easy to use Bluetooth speaker and I’ve been using it for a week now almost everyday. It’s high quality and loud one (not super loud but good enough), connects quickly to my phone. Updating its firmware took 30mins but I don’t mind cause you don’t need to update it regularly. Enables you to talk through it and you can also connect it to another JBL speaker and sync them to play at the same time. Overall 5/5

title: Great Quality for a decent price!
body: I bought this speaker twice now. One for myself, and most recently as a gift. it is well loved!Primarily use it on our kayaks or by the pool. the splashproof feature is what sold me on it.the Bluetooth connection is incredible! I can leave my phone on the charger in my house and it easily reaches to the pool deck without interferene.sound is great quality for such a small speaker!

title: This is our second one.
body: We temporarily left one in a vehicle being repaired.. couldn't live without this awesome speaker so we knew we could have it next day-- just with a click we happily own and use two. One for the pool and one for the bbq ????

title: It’s best
body: It’s alr

title: Great sound
body: I bought this to take out on my small boat so we could have some music and it's great because it's waterproof so I don't have to worry about water spray and it gets pretty loud and sounds clear. The battery life is great it lasts me all day depending if it's used continually or not and if using blue tooth or aux cord.

title: Powerful sound in a small device
body: Love the sound quality and style. Wish the battery lasted longer.

title: Calidad del sonido y facilidad en el manejo
body: EL EQUIPO SOBREPASO MIS ESPECTATIVAS EXCELENTE ADQUISICION

title: Great for my work van.
body: Nice little speaker. Bought for my work van so I can play music and podcasts from my phone. Works good. Super easy to connect and battery life has been great. Sound quality is good but could use more bass. If it is not loud enough there is a "high frequency mode" to boost the volume a little.

title: Ok speaker but terrible battery life
body: I am a restaurant manager with stagehand and sound engineering experience. This speaker is a good speaker if you play music at 75% volume your less. When working in a loud restaurant sometimes it needs to be turned up louder and this speaker doesn’t get as loins as some of the others I’ve had so at times, depending on the kitchen, it was too faint to really enjoy.BATTERY LIFE: is a huge issue. Incase you don’t know, the higher the volume the more power the speaker consumes. I had about 30% battery, I plugged it in to the wall and after about 30 min to an hour it was dead even though it was plugged in.The speaker can use more power than what the charger can deliver. On top of that it doesn’t come with a block just a usb cable. So you better hope you have an extra block laying around.For the price you are paying for the speaker you should get a fast charge block with it.

title: Big quality sound for a great price
body: I purchased the same product about 1.5 years ago but made the mistake of buying it refurbished to save a few bucks. The battery eventually wore down to holding less than an hour charge and before the first year was up I couldn't recharge it anymore so had to dump it. But, this same model is at such a great price I'm buying it new and love it! the sound is huge from this small speaker, it fits in a golf cart perfectly, holds a charge for about 7 hours so far at 100% use, and the price is great! I did my research and this is the best model unit for the sound and price. You won't be disappointed. And buy new, refurbs are a waste of money.

title: This is a kick-but little speaker!
body: I absolutely love this speaker.  Its got great volume - and the battery lasts hours and hours.  I charge mine once or twice a week, and I use it hours daily.  Sound quality is great - the Bluetooth connection is solid once you get it set up, but it was hard to get my phone to connect the first time.  Though that may totally be a DEU problem lol.

title: Great sound
body: I liked this speaker so much I bought this one as a replacement to the one I had received before as a gift.  I needed to buy a replacement because the first one stopped accepting a new charge and just stopped working.  So know that this speak has a built-in obsolescence.

title: Literally good bang for your buck
body: Quality sound, good bass without distortion

title: Solid unit, affordable portable sound
body: About the size of a large can of energy drink, but good sound for the money. A bit light on the bass, but good enough for 90% of music.

title: Excellent speaker phone
body: For a device about the size of a 16 oz beer can, this has very good sound.  Is it a replacement for high quality speakers as some have said? Not even close!  But I don't think it is reasonable to expect that from a device of this size.  Part of my reason for selecting this particular model was for use as a hand free speaker when I work in remote, mobile offices.  This thing excels in that role.  With a group of people in the room, 8-10' away, they can speak in a normal voice and is very clear to the person on the other end.  It also does a good job of canceling back ground noise.

title: Perfect for everything
body: Love every detail, sound quality and battery life. It's worth it. Won't hesitate

title: PLANNED OBSOLENCE?
body: It worked for about 3 years, but I am surprised it's life is over.  It seems like it's charging but when disconnected it won't turn on.  Doubt we'll replace it with another JBL speaker.

title: High Quality Speaker
body: This speaker is amazing. The sound quality is great and I love listening to music and podcasts in the shower. It’s waterproof and durable. I dropped it a few times and it hadn’t taken any damage. The battery lasts a long time, too. It’s a great buy!

title: Jaw-dropping, crystal-clear sound
body: Where's the option for 10 stars? This has jaw-droppingly rich sound. I couldn't believe my ears as I stood in awe listening to this play 2Cellos' "With or Without You." The acoustics are absolute perfection; crystal-clear, with base notes having real depth and vibrato to them as if I were listening live. Simply amazing. I bought this because my friend had a waterproof speaker from another brand that we took kayaking with us - hers cost twice as much as this one but this one is smaller and sounds incredibly better. I am in auditory heaven!UPDATE: 7/23/2017I took this kayaking tonight. Without going into details, this speaker ended up accidentally, completely submerged in the lake... and played beautiful music the entire time. So, I am updating my review to add, this is tested and verified waterproof as advertised!

title: Simplicity of the speaker and clean sound
body: The speakers are great in.a small space ... but go outside and they can't compete with the collection of outside noises. You open your eyes and realize how weak the speaker is amazing sound indoors a quiet house and one of my two speakers will not charge and Amazon requires I speak with JBL rather than process of product exchange after all JBL has a lifetime warranty and replacement of 1 to 3yrs these days. It is in the connection from the charging cord to the device.

title: Great Speaker
body: Love this speaker, it has great sound from such a small, compact speaker. I really love it! Highly recommend!

title: JBL Bluetooth Speaker
body: Sound, battery life, connectivity, is great, I really enjoy my speaker. I use it for traveling to listen to my music I have on my phone, or pandora! Good price! ??

title: A really great sounding product
body: I don't normally do reviews.. (only negative ones) by I'm actually astonished at how good this sounds compared to other portable speakers.We use this speaker in the kitchen and outside on the patio, typically streaming music from bbciplayer (radio 1), amazon music etc.We use it every day really.(Note: I don't use this to truly 'listen' to music as I have a high end amp / speaker setup for that...)I've been through 3 or 4 $30 ish, cheap speakers (returned a few of them) and I am amazed with the difference of how this sounds.Its just got decent volume and all around sound (good bass/treble etc).You do get what you pay for and paying a bit extra for this was defiantly worth it.(FYI. I'm not been paid etc for this review...)

title: Great when we’re outside in our hot tub. Sound quality is great. Small but mighty
body: This is surprisingly small but mighty. Easy to use, very portable, sound quality is great. No worries is gets a little moisture.

title: Big Sound. Small Footprint.
body: These little speakers are amazing! I use mine at work, and bring it home on the weekends. I liked it so well, I bought another one for my significant other. We tethered them together, while Camping, a couple of weeks ago. Had surround sound at the lake.Well worth the money...

title: JBL Flip 4 vs. Trelab HD77
body: I purchased both the JBL Flip 4 and the Trelab HD77.  Both are good speakers for their size. I was impressed with the volume output from relatively small speakers, but found the bass disappointing in both.  Lack of bass is to be expected for the small size.  I did find that placing the speakers in a corner or under kitchen cabinets made a material improvement to the lows for each. I think you can get the same effect by placing them in a medium size open cardboard box as the bass reflects off the walls of the box.  I would be relatively happy with both, but ultimately I'm keeping the Trelab as it was 14 dollars less at 66 bucks compared to 80 bucks for the JBL Flip 4.  In addition, the trelab is slightly larger weighing in at 11 ounces compared to 9.2 ounces for the JBL Flip 4.

title: What a Delightful Speaker
body: Amazing little speaker!! It is great for listening to music or taking calls for work.  The sound quality and weight are perfect for the size.  I have used it near water, in the house, in the garage, and on the go.  I enjoyed it so much, I have given them as gifts too.

title: Great Speaker
body: Wonderful speaker, worth the money.

title: Excellent Speaker!
body: I bought the JBL Flip 3 on the recommendation of friends who rave about their JBL bluetooth speaker. I bought this one on Amazon while on sale and have been thoroughly impressed with the sound quality, volume, and range. I use it while working out, on my bike trainer, working in the garage, or just hanging out with the kids outdoors. I could not be more pleased with it at this point in time! I also purchased a travel case, which I highly recommend for protecting your investment.

title: Sounds real good
body: Battery could last longer

title: Get a color you like.
body: I bought this for my mom, she loves it! I actually bought her two so that she can have a small surround sound system on the go. I have owned JBL speakers for years and they have never let me down. The sound is great, it has a little base but it's not enough to distort the audio.

title: Love this speaker
body: I love this speaker. I have had others that were very disappointing. This was great. It started with the packaging - lovely - nice tabs, organization, box. Then the sound! Terrific! I am not a music snob, but I am somewhat picky about sound and the sound from this speaker is wonderful. I am very pleased.

title: Great Sound, Good Value
body: This is the best of the 5 bluetooth speakers in my possession. I think it is also the most expensive, but you get what you pay for. The main use for this item is playing music from my bluetooth transmitting device, and it does connect very quickly when I power it up.As far as sound quality, it is what I would expect from JBL. I  currently own consumer as well as professional sound reinforcement speakers from JBL. The Flip 4 exceeded my expectations - considering the price. By the time I want another similar item, maybe the Flip 5 or 6 will be out by then. I can't wait to hear how the future will sound.

title: Buy 1, not 2.
body: The speaker is excellent. I used two, paired in stereo, with a Fire tv. First I tried connecting one speaker to the tv by Bluetooth and then linked the two speakers using JBL Connect app. This resulted in intermittent static which went away when I connected the first Flip to the tv with a cable. I then connected the 2nd Flip to the 1st with JBL Connect app. This cleared the static but the app isn’t reliable. It switches off stereo sound without warning. If you are buying one it’s a good product. If you are hoping for reliable stereo (which is excellent when functioning) there must be a better product. I returned mine. Great hardware is undermined by JBL’s unreliable  software.

title: Powerful little speaker
body: Bought this speaker for my 16 year old son. It has nice sound, he was able to connect the Bluetooth from his phone to the speaker in seconds. Battery life lasts most of the day for him and he uses it for everything including music, gaming, watching TV, etc. He uses it everyday & is pleased with the purchase.

title: Awesome speaker with fantastic sound!
body: This speaker looks and sounds amazing! It is just the right size and the battery life is fantastic. I love that it is waterproof and durable because it gives peace of mind during our outdoor activities. It arrived just in time for our camping trip, everyone raved about the speaker and asked what kind it was/where to buy one. The only reason I gave it 4 stores is because I wish there was a button to skip a song on the actual speaker. It's not a huge deal or a deal breaker though. I can skip songs and change volume from my Fitbit or phone so it is still manageable but I would love to have that feature in a future model.

title: Great Sound
body: Excellent bass and overall sound quality.

title: Updated to 5 stars
body: UPDATE: Does last 12 hours if not all the way up 100% volume on a bicycle out on trail. It works 12 hours inside. It works 3 hours full blast on a bike. Got caught in major downpour, left in my water bottle cage. No problems just cleaned the dust from another ride. I would like 12 hours on full blast. Can’t complain though.Original: Just a little over 3 hours of battery life on a FULL charge. How is this close to 12 hours?

title: Auto play
body: The sound is great, so far the battery is great. But when you go out of range and come back in range it should start playing automatically. Although the range is a lot further than my old one.

title: It Bumps
body: Loudest Bluetooth speaker on my block tell you that

title: Won't hold a charge - sound cuts in and out
body: I've had this speaker for less than 2 years. I LOVE the sound quality (for the most part). About a year ago, the battery life began to decline. I was not able to listen for more than a couple hours before needing to plug it in and re-charge. Now the speaker will show a full charge (all dots lit up) but will die and shut down within a half hour at times. Also, when playing, the speaker will cut in and out and makes scratchy noises before it dies completely. I thought that at this price point I'd have something that would last a lot longer and I'm pretty disappointed.

title: pretty good
body: works great sounds amazing but when i’m connected to my phone and try to take a video on snap it stops playing on the speaker and it switches back to my phone audio

title: Perfect wireless speaker, great for outdoor or next to swimming pool.
body: This is great speaker. Perfect size, not too big not to small - just accurate in my opinion. It is waterproof what is big upgrade versus JBL Flip 3 which was just splash proof. Sound is clear with just right amount of bass. It also have voice assistant integration feature. Very easy to pair with your phone and if you have more then one (or some of your friends brought another one) you can connect them together for even better music experience. It comes in 9 different colors you can chose from. I highly recommend it, not only to take your music with you wherever you go but also for listing at home. Total worth money I have spend on it.

title: pretty good
body: not a massive amount of bass but it is a great speaker.i use it in my gym and in my car and it is very good.can get majorly loud if you want it to.

title: Excellent!
body: So easy and good quality and my favorite speaker ever!

title: Great Sound
body: Very happy, good quality, connects faster than most, would buy again!

title: Loud & crisp!
body: This superior speaker performs so much better than my old one and I don't have to worry if it gets wet. It's nice and clear and holds a nice charge. The only flaw is that the length of the charging cord is a bit too short.

title: Best choice for the rught price speaker
body: I prefer the 5 any day but the 4 is where the gold is at for me and it should to you. Everything runs on bluetooth and rarely aux but the flip 5 dont got it so where do you go? You buy the flip 4 here for the right quality and price

title: Perfect for a mechanic
body: Has great sound and volume. I'm able to hear it good over the sound of diesel trucks while working or driving but I can't give it a 5 star. The batteries only last 2 hour maybe 3.

title: great sound and waterproof
body: the speaker is easy to connect with bluetooth and sounds really good when you are doing activities and just listening.

title: Awesome!!!
body: This product is superiority in itself!!!?? If I could afford to buy three more I would as it has the ability to connect to multiple JBL Flip 4 Bluetooth speakers... I have bought many Bluetooth speakers in the past couple years putting them in different places in my home and outside, but I find that the JBL Flip 4 is the best product in Bluetooth speaker that I have bought so far to date... I use one in front of my TV as a sound bar... I do not have to have an actual soundbar to have surround sound quality with the JBL Flip 4... It is easy and simple and fast connecting to your Bluetooth device!!! This product is power in a 6-inch Bluetooth speaker!!! I highly recommend it to anyone and everyone!!!

title: Outstanding quality and bass.
body: This is the perfect device for any application. I use it when I go kayaking, working in the garage or anywhere I want to listen to my music from my phone's playlist. The bass and treble is perfect for such a little device. Great job JBL!!!

title: Less than expected
body: I picked this more expensive unit for the sound quality improvements.  My use is to listen to audio books at night in the bedroom.  However, overall the unit missed the mark on many points.Pros:1.Sound Quality2.Bluetooth rangeCons:1.Annoying sound when turning on and/or off.2.LED charge lights annoyingly too bright and flash from time to time in normal use plugged into AC charger.3.Volume up/down in steps only with no ability to smoothly vary it.4.Unexpectedly the Bluetooth circuit failed in just over 2 years of normal use. (Luckily I can still use the "old fashioned" wired plugs to use it as a speaker paired to the phone.)5.Battery life not especially longer than any competitor.

title: Died in less than 90 days! UPDATE with more info.
body: I am not rich and $80 is a pretty big investment for me to make in a speaker. I reviewed, reviewed and reviewed all these speakers for two weeks before being convinced this was "the best." And, for the first 60 or so days it was. But, out of nowhere, it has now just started turning off while playing music. Full charge, half charge, doesn't matter. It just turns itself off.Do you know how annoying it is to be listening to music and have to go up to the speaker every 10 or so minutes and turn it back on? I mean, come on, that's ridiculous, no? Read ALL the critical reviews on Amazon about this item. You will notice a trend about this sort of thing.The absolute BEST Bluetooth speaker I ever owned was the Soundfreaq SFQ-04 Sound Kick. Unfortunately, I made the mistake of letting my ex-wife have that, thinking I'd win by getting a brand new one. Wrong again. Also, the Soundreaq one was purchased about 6 to 7 years ago and guess what? Not only does it still work like a champ, but it has NEVER had any issues and sounds better than this one.If you are flush and have $80 to spend for 3 months of listening, by all means by this. If not, stay away or better yet, get a Soundreaq.UPDATE: Just realized the main reason I'm sure many of you want to buy this is due to it being waterproof. Just found out Soundfreaq made a follow-up to the model I had, the Sound Kick 2 and it is water resistant! You can find this on Amazon or even lower priced on eBay. Please, for me, buy this one instead.

title: Heat equals battery drain
body: I can't be biased about JBL products... been one of my favorite products for decades.As for the JBL tube, the audio is excellent for the 26'x30' room I have it in, and the range of the Bluetooth connectivity exceeds most other devices I've had. Great product for the price.

title: Great sounding little speaker for beach/pool
body: I've been very impressed by this. We've taken it to the windy beach and it sounded great. Battery life is long and lasts all day, but be prepared to charge it a few hours when it is low. I have not tried to take in the water, but it claims to be waterproof.

title: The Real Deal
body: Don't order this product from any other seller or website. I made that mistake the first time and spent too much on a shoddy knockoff. This one is the real deal and the difference in audio quality and build is obvious. I bring this to work with me on delivery days and my coworkers adore having this speaker around. I like my music loud and it's the perfect combination of volume and portability. The battery tends to run down quickly, like in a couple hours when it's on full volume, but turning it down a bit can conserve the battery life, or I just bring a charger with me. Worth every penny for the joy of music.

title: Great Speaker!!
body: This Is A Great Speaker!! Nice Sound Quality And It Plays For A Long Time And I Dont Have To Charge It Very Much And I Use It Everyday. The Color Is Beautiful And Looks Just Like The Picture. Comes In A Nice Little Box And Has A Charging Cord USB.

title: If you don’t like bass, this is the speaker for you.
body: Just as the title says, there is no bass to this little thing. It’s aesthetically pleasing but the sound ha me feeling like travolta in pulp fiction looking for the intercom. It just isn’t there. I tried turning it up a bit but the sound started to distort and I was afraid to blow the speaker.So if you need a portable speaker that you have to be next to to hear and that has no bass, look no further.Instant return. 0/10 would not recommend.

title: Not that loud...really no bass...really disappointed for what I spent on it
body: it lasts as long as you need it to...if u want a bass speaker don't buy this one...ill be looking for a better one with more bass....jbl is a fail for me

title: Great sound in a small packakge
body: Just what I hoped it would be!  It sounds great and takes up no space.

title: Happy with product
body: Works great, I use it every day at work in construction sites. I wish the battery life lasted longer but the price seems fair for a JBL product.

title: Charge cable faulty
body: The sound quality is not bad just don’t listen with volume turned all the up. Loud enough for most uses. Sound quality is pretty good. I use mine in garage during exercise. Only thing the charging cable is defective. The plastic in USB PLUG is centered it should be off set. Plug does not fit. Not a deal breaker though. I have other plugs that fit. Other wise I would give 5 stars

title: Started crackling after one year
body: The speaker worked great for a year but then started to periodically crackle. We never used it at full volume so was disappointed it didn’t last very long.

title: Huge Sound From A Tiny Package
body: I travel a lot and hate watching TV. I use this for music and movie sound from my iPad at the hotels. It truly sounds like a big speaker system. Highs, mids and lows all sound clean and clear. I challenge any of you to find a better sounding BT speaker for the price.

title: Invincible
body: Literally left this outside overnight in a heavy rain storm by accident and it started right up the next day. Sound quality was not impaired at all. Take this to the beach, pool etc. this thing is tough. Highly recommend it

title: Quality portable Bluetooth speaker
body: This product is well-made, easy to connect, great quality audio.

title: Great speaker
body: Great speaker that I really enjoy. My only issue I've had with it is that it sometimes has trouble connecting and playing music from my phone, but otherwise it's very good. It's pretty loud for it's size and has great bass, which is exactly what I was looking for.

title: Sounds great, long battery life
body: This is the perfect speaker for my golf cart. I purchased a separate holder for it. Plays loud, clear, we used this 4th of July weekend and only needed to charge it twice. It was a 5 day Holiday for us. Very impressed. Definitely recommend.

title: Easy to use, great sound and range
body: I bought two of these and when they arrived I was surprised how small they are. But they pack an amazing sound in a very small housing. The volume can be turned very high with little to no distortion at highest setting.It took less than a minute to pair the first one with my phone and connect the second one for party mode (I did not use the app).They also seem to have a pretty good range. I placed one speaker in the garage, kept the phone in my pocket for skipping songs and worked all over my large front and side yard never lost connection or had any other kind of issues.I haven't and won't test if they are really waterproof. ??So far I'm very happy with them.

title: Bass and quality
body: I love this speaker it’s sound crystal clear and the bass works really good, for in your hand perfect for Any ware you go definitely 100% you should get

title: Battery life horrible
body: The title says it all.. It has a pretty good sound but it’s not like loud!! I mean I use it throughout the house but I know it wouldn’t be loud enough of the beach or a kickback.. and I literally have to charge it everyday. The battery life last maybe 3 hours tops for me. I might have a defective one idk...

title: Great speaker, but it dies
body: I bought this system just to have a better speaker sound and having my other speakers for years, i wanted a back up just in case. When i came across this speaker, i was so excited, in spite of some negative reviews of it dying on others. I really enjoyed the time i had with this speaker. I loved the rich bass, loudness, overall sound quality. The issue im having is it stopped working 3 weeks ago! I never dropped it, wet it or anything. It wont charge; just a complete disappointment. Its only been a few months! Oh! Also, it used to die after 2- 3 hours inspite of being fully charged.

title: Fabulous
body: I loved everything about it easy to use and I use it for the pool

title: Incredible Sound In a Small Package
body: Wow! Incredible sound in a small package! Solid bass, crisp high tones. Gives much cleaner sound than Bose Soundlink Color II. Every bit as good as it’s bigger JBL brother, which my son has, just a wee bit smaller. Easily connects to all of my devices. Highly recommend.

title: Great sound from a small speaker.
body: This isn't a computer generated or paid review. Searched for a week for a bluetooth speaker that could go outdoors, was at least splash resistant (This one claims to be waterproof, I don't wanna test that out lol) and had decent db/watts. Read many reviews and decided on JBL. So far, this speaker has it all. Just got it today and tested it out. Sounds great, the high end sounds wonderful and the low end is fantastic. Seems pretty rugged and durable. Not sure how well the battery life is yet, but I should be able to get a few hours out of it at full volume. I would recommend if you this is in your price range. I'll update if there are any issues. But so far, so good.

title: 10/10 Sound & function, we’ll see about battery life!
body: Amazing sound, but I’ve seen some reviews about battery life decreasing over time... will update if it does. Worth it so far, esp since I got it on a whim when it was 50% off : )

title: Just as good as the bigger one!
body: I bought this smaller one as I already have its bigger brother, the charge 4.  Sound quality is just as good! And they connect to make a great surround sound! I may buy a few more of these!

title: It’s worth love it
body: For me I think it should be a bit louder but that’s just me ?? I Hate that I can’t charge my phone like the other ones... besides that I love it I used it almost everyday is not bad for the size I love this Brand the battery ?? last long is worth buying...  ????????

title: Not water Proof
body: I finally got my little speaker wet, and it stopped working right. I had in my Kayak tied off to me, when I rolled out of my kayak. I have a little fishing kayak I was going down the river in. I became off balanced and flipped out. There not large rapids, it's just a cheap kayak and poor center of gravity.  At any rate the water wasn't very deep and I was able to stand up, drain and jump back in my kayak. Speaker keeps connecting and disconnecting now. When it worked, it had pretty good sound, good volume, ok bass line for it's size.

title: Speaker
body: Almost spent an additional $100 on a beats pill, but this work just as good if not better so definitely a good investment!

title: Teenaged son loves it
body: I bought it for my son for Christmas and he uses it everyday.

title: Money well spend
body: I love love love my Flip 4 JBL the sound quality is good the Bluetooth connectivity easy and battery is long lasting. I use it everyday to do chores while I’m getting ready to work or when I just want to dance it out with my kids or by myself I love it.

title: sound quality, connectivity, battery life, design -  all excellent !
body: I just wanted a bluetooth speaker for my phone and my laptop...  Reviews led me to jbl flip 4.  I totally love it so far.  Mostly I need excellent sound quality at all volumes...  If there was even a slight problem with sound quality I would return it and get something else...  This speaker is Very good quality...  Connectivity is instant, reliable.  Battery life is way beyond what i expected.  I am way more than satisfied right now... I take it with me everywhere !  Update 3 years later... Still the best speaker i own for portable blue tooth... Would highly highly recommend you buy it wherever you can find it.

title: Well made and sounds great
body: These are the best portable speakers on the market. Surprisingly loud with full range highs and lows. Durable and well constructed. First speaker I bought 6 years ago and have brought it with me on countless outdoor trips. Works just as well now as it did on day one.

title: Great purchase
body: Had this for over a year and the battery life is just as great as the first day I got it. So worth the money. I take this everywhere with me. Haven’t tested out the waterproof-ness of it because I’m just not brave enough. I’ve been through so many speakers and they all lose battery life so quickly no matter the price. Gets pretty loud I’ve used this by the pool and the beach on vacations and it’s been loud enough. If youre outside and have a lot of people around you might need to snag another one and link it though

title: Flip 4 still FLIPPING
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 Arrived on time & I'm already banging Dancehall & Reggae through the speakers!!!! #FLIPPING #Camo

title: Like a Boss
body: I cant say enough about this thing. I have ranted about it so much my friends and family heard it and purchased as well. Perfect sound for the size. I am a heavy traveler and take this everywhere. Hokds an awesome charge, sounds crystal clear with a little thump. Perfect for outside and fills the house with sound. I connect to my tv and sounds so much better than the stock tv speakers. Now with connect plus, you can connect numerous speakers together. I comnected mine and my Dads and sounds amazing. Need a liitle more bass? Use connect plus and an extreme and the neighbors will love you. These things are well worth the price, and live the JBL sound. Move over Bose, you have competition.

title: Perfect bathroom speaker
body: I use this on the bathroom counter so I can listen to podcasts and news while taking a shower. Loud and clear. About the same size as a tall boy beer can. Battery life is many many hours. I use it roughly 25 minutes per day and charge it every two weeks or so

title: B+
body: Been looking for a relatively cheap option for a quality bt speaker to use while golfing and lounging outside, and I think the flip4 is the sweet spot.  20 and 30 dollar products just dont have the same functionality and rich sound you get with this speaker.It's extremely easy to use; I was listening to music within a couple minutes of opening the box. Came with 3/5 bars of battery power.Only fault I can really point to: even though it appears to be like a cylindrical room filling speaker, the audio is very 'directional' in that you'll notice a significant change in clarity when listening off-center or away from the JBL symbol.

title: Excellent for its price
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 It is an excellent product, it sounds excellent it is beautiful and I love it but I give it 4 stars because it gets dirty so easily. (btw the video is compressed)

title: A+++
body: Best Bluetooth speaker I’ve ever brought

title: Good thing in small package
body: This little guy kicks really well. The range is great, you hear the bass yet it doesn't drown out the treble. Lasts all day of constant use and charges quick. Will play while charging. I take this skateboarding with me almost daily.Cool feature it will pair with another like JBL and play the same music so you have 2 speakers playing even though only 1 is actually connected to your device.

title: Great sound
body: It may be early but I’ve been using this speaker less than a week but have loved it so far Impressed with the sound and battery and the Bluetooth has a very strong connection been using this for grilling when working on vehicles or just about anything really it’s been wonderful so far

title: No good way to stand it.
body: Nice contact portable Bluetooth speaker. Apparently, you can pair it with other compatible jbl speaker to extend the range.I was disappointed that it doesn't have a good way to stand it. It doesn't really game a base. It's completely round. I've been standing on its end which is cantilevered and doesn't stand perpendicular. The bass drivers are out the ends of the tube so standing it this way drives the bass into the shelf and the other end into open air.

title: Great speaker, great sound, my kids steal it though
body: Like everything about the speaker. I would buy it again, and might have to because my kids now take it and scamper off with it.  One thing of note, is I have the best luck connecting it, by going to the ipad first and turning the bluetooth on, then pressing the power on button, on the JBL speaker.

title: Great Buy!
body: I love this speaker! I've had it a few months now and it still works as well as the day I first opened it. This thing is a survivor. I've accidentally dropped it a few times (the other day ON CONCRETE) and it didn't even scratch. The sound quality is great, battery life is long, and when it does take it's last tumble I'll definitely replace it with another one of the same :) LOVE IT!

title: Much better than Oontz Angle...
body: This is the 4th small blutooth speaker I've owned and by far the best.  It blows the Oontz angle out of the water in terms of volume and bass.  This speaker works best in a smaller space without too much distance between it and the listener.  For it's size the bass is really great.  That said if you take it outside or into a large room it tends to feel a little tinny at high volumes, but for it's size I think it's the best in this category aside from maybe a bose.  Very happy. Definitely above average blutetooth speaker. Fine for bedroom listening. Bass is good. Terrible a tad tinny.

title: Buy this speaker
body: I bought this speaker a couple years ago and it still is blasting music and it’s been through everything. Best speaker for your money.

title: Good investment!
body: After seeing my music friends use JBL for years, I finally invested in a JBL. I actually caved because I wanted something that could carry music when hanging out in my backyard. I LOVE this and so glad I was able to invest in this. Looking forward to many more years with this baby here. The color is ON POINT and fun too!

title: JBL Speaker
body: Works pretty good. I'm enjoying the flexibility and the sound associated with a blue tooth speaker of this size. I have come to the conclusion that the louder the speaker and further away I stand the better it sounds. The batter life is very good.

title: This is what you’re looking for!
body: This speaker is the best by far. We love it so much we bought a second one for my husband to bring to work. The bass is impressive, clear sound, and the battery life is long. Highly recommend.

title: Great Quality!
body: For such a small speaker, this little thing packs a punch! Very good sound quality. Crisp sounds. Picks up every detail in a song, including the bass and every instrument on between. We love it!Doesn't matter what you're listening to either.We've played metal, classical, even gregorian chants while playing warhammer haha. It's perfect!

title: Quality of the product and performance.
body: Almost all things are good except Bluetooth connectivity to my other device. It is auto connected to my ipad once the power on but when i tried to connect to my iphone even if i turn off to my ipad stl i could not connect the Bluetooth to my iphone. I dont know why!

title: INSTRUCTIONS ARE USSLESS !
body: First of all the sounds great but all that is pointless when you have instructions that are about 15% in English . No lie i thought it was a different book for Spanish & Japanese customers. Theres no way of finding hes dead. No way of starting up, troubleshooting & general descriptions . I was in awe. But my question is why do i hear loud thumps from inside speaker when its turned up real loud & you lower or increase volume !

title: Good Speaker! Sounds great and has good battery life.
body: This speaker has been a classic for me and my family, so when our old one broke I knew I had to buy another. 10/10

title: Dead Battery
body: Bought one speaker 2 years ago and it will not hold its charge after 1 year…. So I bought another 13 months ago and this speaker will not even charge now…. $200 plus wasted… good sound, but I need it to last…

title: Great portable, waterproof speaker
body: Great speaker with admirable bass. I like how you can either stand it up or lay it down. The battery life seems pretty good too. I haven't used it continuously, but definitely a couple hours here and there, lasting multiple days or weeks without needing a charge.

title: No charger!
body: This is my 3rd jbl speaker. I like that it is water proof and it has good sound. I bought my last two through Walmart. This last one was through Amazon and it did not come with a charger. Makes me wonder if it was refurbished. The downside is they only last about two years. After that the charging port breaks.

title: Great Sound From Such a Small Speaker!
body: Just received this little beauty a week before scheduled delivery date (gotta love Amazon)!  This little guy is a great speaker...I listen to a lot of bass heavy music (dance, edm, rap) and I'm pleasantly surprised at how it handles at the uppermost volume levels. Can't expect much bass outta such a small speaker, but it does have the radiators on either end that definitely push a little bit of air and achieve a good overall sound.  The clarity of this thing is very nice and unlike some other speakers I've heard, when the bass hits, the clarity does not suffer....gotta love that, shows great quality and that's how I measure how good a speaker is.  A sure recommend and the small size makes portability very accommodating....good job JBL!!!

title: Amazing sound. Highly recommend.
body: This thing sounds incredible for the size. You can legitimately feel the bass of the lows, the mids are punchy and warm, the highs are clear. There's no distortion at high volume. JBL knows how to build a speaker, even portable ones. Ive owned a few other brands in this size and they don't even come close to this one.

title: Very Happy
body: Let me start by saying that I just purchased this a week ago for a long weekend.  I am not the most tech savvy person but this was very easy to setup.  For years, we have been using our laptop outside for music and I decided enough was enough.  For three straight days we played this in rather hot weather in the beating sun and each day it lasted around 9 hours.  The quality of sound was great and we had no issues at all with any skipping.  I wasn't sure if it would be worth the extra money but I'm very pleased and would definitely recommend.

title: Solid build, decent sound, wish battery life was better
body: Solid build, ok/decent sound, but I wish the battery life was better. I get about 4 hours at about 70% volume. Still, I'm glad I bought it and would buy it again.

title: Love it!
body: Perfectly portable

title: Great price for an awesome speaker!
body: JBL has an amazing sound quality.  We have several of these.  We take two to the beach and pair them for surround sound.  Waterproof and long playing on a single charge.  This is the smaller one but still has big sound.  Not exactly as crisp as our Bose but in a blind sound test it would be hard to tell which was which and for the value JBL wins hands down!

title: Love!
body: It was a lot smaller than I thought, but that made it all the better! Such a powerful sound from such a small device, so I was thoroughly impressed. Wonderful packaging, and instructions are fairly simple. I tried it out in my living room and the sound resonated through the entire house. Definitely will be using it for background music for dinner parties, and can be used for outdoor parties as well, since it is waterproof. It has a little strap that you could put around your wrist so you don't have to worry about accidentally dropping it. I wish they had a pink color, but the gray is super chic and matches any aesthetic. My sister wanted to buy her own after seeing mine. Definitely would recommend to a friend.

title: It really is water proof
body: I bought the flip 4 because i was impressed with my brothers flip 3 . It connected with my phone easily has great sound . i am an audiophile and i still can not figure out how JBL gets such great sound out of a cylinder. I believe it has a class D amplifier in it.  I had it setting on a ledge in my bath tub and it rolled and fell in the water . I pulled it out dried it off and it works perfectly . the cylindrical shape makes it prone to rolling. Standing it up straight improves the bass but limits sound stage. plan on buying another one and connecting them .

title: Great customer service!
body: I had this for about 1 year and loved it!  Never got it wet.  Never dropped it.  Never left it outside. However Last week it stopped charging.  However I contacted JBL and they'll replace it

title: The kids happy!
body: Works good

title: Great Speaker, but iffy battery life
body: The speaker is honestly really great. The sound quality is awesome and the volume is very powerful as well. My husband and I both have our own speaker for us to use at our workplaces. For me, the battery life is fine since I don’t have the volume up very loud. My husband, on the other hand, has to have his very loud at work, so his battery depletes really fast. He can only play it for three hours from a full charge before it dies on him, while mine can last all day long without charging at the lower volume settings. Other than the battery, the speaker is great!

title: Dynamic sounds and hardy product makes this a great purchase
body: First, this is a great portable Bluetooth speaker. My previous speaker was an Oontz Angle 3, and this clearly blows it out of the water. JBL Flip 3 has amazing sound quality for music, movies, and audibles. It has proper sound dynamics and range, at least that I can tell, at both low and high volumes. The bass is great, but not phenomenal. I love that it is waterproof. Sometimes I let it hang on the edge of the bathtub where it'll get wet but it still works. The Bluetooth pairs quickly with my devices, and the range is decent, I'd say standard. Only star knock off is the inability to skip songs (but you can pause and play) and lack of real strong bass sounds.

title: Nice speaker for the money
body: Sound is great up until the top 10% of the volume which then gets a tad bit distorted. I do not hate on it for this though seeing as it is relatively small and still manages to sound really good even at 100%. At ~50% volume the battery lasts for 8+ hours in my experience. I have tested the waterproofing out by bringing it into the shower with me for some shower sing alongs and so far no issues. My favorite thing about it though is the Bluetooth range. It is so much better than some of the other speakers I have owned in the past. I can set it down and go anywhere in the house without any issues.

title: The sound of this product is beyond what I expected!!!
body: This has been just a great purchase!!! So easy to connect to your Bluetooth and the battery life last hours and hours

title: Battery Life Shortened After a Year
body: I do love this little speaker for its color, sound quality, durability, and portability, but the battery life sucks.  It was great for maybe the first year or so, but after a while I had to begin charging it after only using it for about an hour.  I only keep the volume about halfway up, only use it 1-2 times a week, and I don't have heavy bass on.  The battery life is longer with an aux cable instead of bluetooth (naturally), but I find the aux cables don't work really well with this - they get staticky and don't get full volume.  I've gotten used to keeping it plugged in to charge while I use it (though it never shows that it's ever fully charged anymore, even when charging while powered off), but for camping and hanging out by thr pool, I'd certainly prefer the battery life to be much longer.

title: Great speaker, you won’t be disappointed.
body: We had an older JBL speaker that was a gift but we wanted another one. We have had other brand speakers but nothing that compares. Definitely worth the $.  Sound is so good even outside at the beach, camping, etc. They make great speakers!

title: Hard to complain...I guess
body: Loved it and used it a lot.  Recently the micro USB connection for charging ended up with all the pins bent and it no longer will charge.It looks like they have addressed this issue with the flip5, using a USB-c connection now.I went to see about getting support and possibly sending it in for repair but it says my window for support ended this past summer.  Why wouldn't they allow someone to send it in to get repaired? I don't expect the service to be free.  Oh well.

title: Extremely impressed
body: Admittedly, it has been several years since I’ve purchased a Bluetooth speaker so I’m not up to date with the product space.  I currently have several rooms in our house and garage connected to apple air ports with amplified speakers.  However, I needed something that I could use by our kiddy pool in the back yard so I purchased this speaker.  I am so completely impressed with the quality, sound resolution and portability of this speaker that I’m rethinking my entire house setup.  I almost can’t believe the amount of fidelity and bass response of this tiny speaker.  I typically don’t write product reviews but felt compelled to give credit to JBL for this product.

title: It has JBL connect plus instead of JBL connect.
body: This is a nice blutooth speaker don't really see a difference from JBL flip 3. Only thing which is different is it has JBL connect plus instead of JBL connect. Which makes this device the odd one out. I don't understand why JBL has done this. Now that all of my friends having a JBL connect I am unable to join in. I think JBL should give an update for all the newly launched products otherwise JBL flip 4 will just be stand alone device.

title: Awesome sound
body: This so far is the best sounding bluetooth speaker I've had and heard for the price, The quality and volume is amazing for its size.

title: Love it!
body: Could not love this little speaker more. The sound quality is great and it is powerful, we use it to play music outside but it is loud enough to use for a large party. Very portable and easy to synch up to…we love it!

title: These are great. I was using the JBL for quite some ...
body: These are great. I was using the JBL for quite some time and I never complained from them, until the unfortunate event where my nephew dropped them on the floor and the bass was busted. I went on to buy the FLIP 4  and the sound is noticeably better along with the quality and the great waterproof features ( which i don't really intend to risk using in the water, but it's good to know it's there)the only thing that bugged me is that the FLIP had a cover along with a charger, which was a cool feature. the FLIP 4 on the other hand, come with a charging cable only.nevertheless, the quality is great for the price and the built and design is FANTASTIC. Definitely recommended!

title: Great sound
body: I’m not an audio snob, but this sounds great to me. Battery life isn’t all that impressive. Maybe 4 to 5 hours at the most. But it’s super handy to be able to listen to podcasts or audiobooks or music as i’m doing work around the house.

title: Wonder Bluetooth divice
body: Works like a dream the sound quality is great it’s connects to my Bluetooth devices instantly and so far the battery life is wonderful and it’s so sturdy you can take it anywhere! If this one disappeared I would purchase again And it’s waterproof

title: Fantastic Speaker
body: Fantastic speaker, super loud for size, battery life is insane, waterproof feature is great. Bought this for our pool, camping, and boating, it's perfect. Packs a punch when it comes to sound, and is definitely worth the $$$$.

title: Nice speaker. Mids and highs are nice and clear ...
body: Nice speaker. Mids and highs are nice and clear even at max volume. As with all speakers this small, there is no real bass to speak. For battery life reference, I have a JBL Flip 3 that I play at work at low volumes (Five “+” volume clicks up from 0). I get about 10 hours of playtime. Outside at 100% volume with the Flip 4, I get about 2 hours. The Flip 3 and 4 both have a 3000mAh battery so they should be pretty similar. I bring the Flip 4 kayaking and have even spent time with it in the hot tub. The IPX7 rating really holds up. Just make sure the cover for the Aux /USB port is closed.

title: Very cool, well made, a little heavy, heavy bass
body: I didn't really need a speaker that could go down a meter in the water, so there's extra weight for that kind of protection, though it also seems pretty indestructible and well made. The sound is very heavily weighted to the bass, so I have to use an equalizer on my devices to make it listenable for me. Connects easily to any device.

title: great speaker
body: it's an awesome speaker.  I thought it would be louder but I love it and would buy again.

title: JBL has the best speakers
body: This speaker works great! Sound quality is impressive and the battery lasts long!

title: Good speaker
body: I use this at work and it is very handy and has survived many drops onto the concrete floor

title: Cool & great sounding
body: It’s a great sounding and long lasting rechargeable battery.

title: muy bueno
body: muy bueno

title: Great quality, No wall charger. One Style flaw
body: Impressed with quality. Really great sound, especially for the size. I dont need to max out the volume. I bought 2 of these and syncing them both up to my iphone is super easy with the app. It takes about 10 seconds.Taking away one star, because I feel like a wall based charger piece should have been included.And also, because JBL insisted on slapping me in the face with their red logo across the center while it is already on the side bass piece. Definitely takes the design down a notch in my taste when they force you to advertise for them. Remove it, or at least make it match the camoflauge pattern. C'mon...

title: Incredible sound; Beyond impressed
body: I almost never leave product reviews, but I felt compelled to let others now how great of a speaker this is. The sound is absolutely incredible and I couldn't be more impressed. The lows and highs are both pronounced, but without masking the mids. I'm blown away by this little speaker.

title: Great speaker!
body: I love this thing so much! I wanted a speaker that had really good sound quality at higher volumes and that’s exactly what I got! I do wish the battery lasted a little longer but it’s not too bad!

title: Compact size, excellent personal sound.
body: When you go to the beach you don’t want a big bulky boom box to annoy everyone around you. Provides excellent quality sound for a one or two party use. Good background sound and surprisingly good bass. You can use it all day without charging. And I love the fact that it’s water resistant.

title: Quality sound
body: I bought this for quality sound in a small package that was also affordable that i could bring to work. This fit the bill. It replaces my computer speakers and i even use it for my virtual meetings.

title: Charge 3 vs flip 4
body: Bought this for my backyard to link up with my JBL charge 3. Took forever to link up, had to link it by the app but once it finally got done I was able to link them together. The flip isn't as good as the charge 3, I should of just bought another charge 3.The sound quality is spotty sometimes on it's own or hooked up to another speaker. When that happens I usually just turn it off and on until it doesn't sound like your on a cell phone hearing every other word. The volume doesn't get as loud as the charge 3. This speaker is good for when you don't have a big loud crowd.If you want a smaller speaker to carry around this one is good. If you want a speaker to compete with the crowd then charge 3 is the way to go.

title: Battery
body: Battery is decent though I feel like it dies fast after use

title: Bluetooth issues
body: Purchased this for my husband to take Microsoft Teams calls while WFH.  This device has some issues with maintaining a connection.  It makes a sound to indicate it has connected, however, it will randomly drop (as in shut off) in the middle of a call.  There is no sound to indicate this.  The person on the other end of the call just loses you and your PC/phone just shows the device as not being connected.  It goes to sleep without a reason why beyond that it has timed out.  It's not that the device is not in use or not sending/receiving for a set amount of time, though.  The device itself was not moved during the call and was about a foot away from the PC it was connected to.  Both the Flip and the PC are brand new.  Looking online, I see that if you set your phone/PC to full volume and only use the volume controls on the device that it will supposedly stay on.  I haven't tried this yet.  I did just update the firmware on the Flip so perhaps between the two it will work.Honestly for the price this is a pretty bad design flaw.  Not many people would be hard-wiring the device vs. using bluetooth.  I could understand a timeout after a set period of non-use, but not while the device is actively being used.  That's just weird.Overall the sound is ok so I guess I'll keep troubleshooting.  I'll give it a couple days and if it doesn't improve I'll return it.  If I had to buy over again I would choose a different product.

title: JBL knocked it out of the park with this one!
body: I would have never thought such good quality sound can be produced by such a small speaker.  This thing really is great.  And the fact that you can pair several of them together (they say up to 100 but to be honest that overkill) is great.  I've got a second one on the way!Quick Update:I now have three of these.  Pairing them together couldn't be simpler. They hold a charge for a long time too.  Also hooked one up to an old radio using a 3.5mm cable.  Puts the radios speakers to shame.  Can't say enough positive things about these Flip4's!

title: Great sound and easy to use
body: The song quality and Bluetooth connectivity works well since I'm in a loud vehicle for most of the day. The battery life holds up but since I keep it plugged in most of the time I like how it stays on and I can continue with my music at any point in time.

title: Sound quality muddy.
body: While I am happy with my purchase, I am a disappointed and confused about the sound quality. Reviews I read all mentioned a lack of bass. I found this speaker very bass heavy and the mids very muddy and weak sounding. Not real sure why this is the best, when you can buy small computer speakers for this price and size that are much more accurate. Sure would be nice if they would put a simple EQ circuit in these things. Cost would be a couple of dollars or just get rid of the speaker phone/computer interface stuff.The build quality seems to be solid.Just wish it sounded better.

title: Great sound for small speaker !!!

title: More of an indoor speaker than outdoor.
body: I bought this item, skeptical because I am not a JBL fan and because no where does it say what the Wattage of the speakers are. Soooo based off of the reviews of customers and the description provided, I purchased it. Is this speaker loud, yes its its, however here is the issue. This is more of an indoor speaker and not an outdoor speaker. While indoors, you will be amazed at how load this baby is, it truly fills up the room. But once outside, it loses it umph. I own several blue tooth speakers and I like to buy new ones to upgrade from my old ones. I bought this for the purpose of biking and sadly it will not stand up to my other speakers such as my treblab and transmart. With that said, I am slightly disappointed. If you want an indoor bluetooth, then by all means, this is the one and you can forget the rest. But if you want a speaker for outdoors, where there are no walls to bounce sound off, this will not suffice.It also charges pretty fast and does last close to 12 hours. But again, if you want something for your apt, home or office, this is the best you can get for the price and size.
